name: Breaking Bad
overview: Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family's financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: High school chemistry teacher Walter White's life is suddenly transformed by a dire medical diagnosis. Street-savvy former student Jesse Pinkman "teaches" Walter a new trade.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has a rare form of lung cancer, he decides to team up with a former student and create a top of the line crystal meth in a used RV, to provide for his family once he is gone.

episodes.name: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin. Walt's wife, Skyler, becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.

episodes.name: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.overview: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8. Meanwhile, Hank has a scared straight moment with Walter Jr. after his aunt discovers he has been smoking pot. Also, Skylar is upset when Walter stays away from home.

episodes.name: Cancer Man
episodes.overview: Walter finally tells his family that he has been stricken with cancer. Meanwhile, the DEA believes Albuquerque has a new, big time player to worry about. Meanwhile, a worthy recipient is the target of a depressed Walter's anger, and Jesse makes a surprise visit to his parents home.

episodes.name: Gray Matter
episodes.overview: Walter and Skyler attend a former colleague's party. Jesse tries to free himself from the drugs, while Skyler organizes an intervention.

episodes.name: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.overview: The side effects of chemo begin to plague Walt. Meanwhile, the DEA rounds up suspected dealers.

episodes.name: A No Rough Stuff Type Deal
episodes.overview: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer after a PTA meeting. Elsewhere, Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market and Skyler is the recipient of a baby shower.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Walt must deal with the chain reaction of his choice, as he and Jesse face new and severe consequences. When danger and suspicion around Walt escalate, he is pushed to new levels of desperation. Just how much higher will the stakes rise? How far is Walt willing to go to ensure his family's security? Will his grand plan spiral out of control?

episodes.name: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse are vividly reminded of Tuco’s volatile nature, and try to figure a way out of their business partnership. Hank attempts to mend fences between the estranged Marie and Skyler.

episodes.name: Grilled
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse find themselves in close quarters with an unhinged Tuco. Marie and Hank comfort Skyler, who is distraught over Walt’s disappearance. Hank pays a visit to Mrs. Pinkman on some not-so-official business.

episodes.name: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse become short on cash when they try to cover their tracks. Meanwhile, the DEA has a lead that could them straight to Walt and Jesse.

episodes.name: Down
episodes.overview: Walt attempts to reconnect with his family, while Jesse struggles to rebuild his life.

episodes.name: Breakage
episodes.overview: Hank suffers from the aftermath of his encounter with Tuco. Meanwhile, Jesse hires a crew to get their product out on the streets.

episodes.name: Peekaboo
episodes.overview: Walt's secret is in jeopardy when Skyler thanks Gretchen for paying for his treatment.

episodes.name: Negro y Azul
episodes.overview: Jesse and Walt discuss expanding into new territories; Hank struggles to fit in; Skyler pursues a new job opportunity; Jesse gets to know his landlord.

episodes.name: Better Call Saul
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse seek advice from a shady attorney when Badger gets in trouble with the law; the DEA believes they have caught up with "Heisenberg" ; Hank returns.

episodes.name: 4 Days Out
episodes.overview: Walt and his family wait for news after he undergoes a PET-CT scan. Walt follows Saul's advice; Jesse's relationship with Jane is put on hold when he and Walt head to the desert for a marathon of cooking.

episodes.name: Over
episodes.overview: Walt and Hank get into a heated argument at a party. Skyler opens up to her boss. Jane hides her relationship with Jesse from her father.

episodes.name: Mandala
episodes.overview: As the end of her pregnancy finds Skyler conflicted about her feelings, a dealer's death forces Walt to look for somewhere to unload a load of meth.

episodes.name: Phoenix
episodes.overview: As Walt explores money laundering options, he and Jesse spar over the profits from their latest deal. Jesse and Jane clash with her father. Walt makes a fatal decision.

episodes.name: ABQ
episodes.overview: Skyler confronts Walt about his secrecy; Jesse falls apart; and Jane's grief-stricken father takes action that results in further tragedy.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Walt continues to battle dueling identities: a desperate husband and father trying to provide for his family, and a newly appointed key player in the Albuquerque drug trade. As the danger around him escalates, Walt is now entrenched in the complex worlds of an angst-ridden family on the verge of dissolution, and the ruthless and unrelenting drug cartel.

episodes.name: No Más
episodes.overview: Walt faces a new threat, on a new front and deals with an increasingly angry Skyler, who must consider what to do next with her life and the kids. Meanwhile, Jesse comes face-to-face with some startling self-revelations.

episodes.name: Caballo sin Nombre
episodes.overview: Despite ever-increasing tension between Walt and Skyler, he pulls out all the stops in an effort to reconcile with the family. Elsewhere, Saul is instrumental in getting Jesse involved in a most-unusual investment opportunity.

episodes.name: I.F.T.
episodes.overview: Walt ignores Skyler's demands, furthering the rift between them and pushing her to break bad. Still suffering from panic and anxiety attacks, Hank crosses a line at work.

episodes.name: Green Light
episodes.overview: Walt loses control as he reacts to Skyler's news, endangering his job and relationships with Saul and Jesse. Hank throws himself into his blue meth investigation. Jesse enacts a new plan.

episodes.name: Más
episodes.overview: Gus increases his efforts to lure Walt back into business, forcing a rift between Walt and Jesse. Skyler doubts her new relationship. Marie confides in Skyler about her concern for Hank's well-being.

episodes.name: Sunset
episodes.overview: Walt settles into his new surroundings; Walt, Jr. wants answers about his parents' relationship; Hank's investigation causes problems for Walt and Jesse.

episodes.name: One Minute
episodes.overview: Hank's increasing volatility forces a confrontation with Jesse and trouble at work. Skyler pressures Walt to make a deal. Gus' actions have severe consequences.

episodes.name: I See You
episodes.overview: The family waits for news about Hank. While Jesse covers at the lab, Walt attempts to placate Gus. After witnessing a disturbing outburst, Walt worries he and his family are in danger.

episodes.name: Kafkaesque
episodes.overview: As Hank's hospital bills stack up, Skyler hatches a plan. Walt and Gus come to a better understanding. Jesse, looking for more independence, pursues a new opportunity.

episodes.name: Fly
episodes.overview: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab and refuses to finish the cook until it is eliminated. A frustrated Jesse attempts to get Walt back on track.

episodes.name: Abiquiu
episodes.overview: Skyler gets involved with Walt's business. Hank struggles with his recovery. Jesse makes a startling discovery after meeting a girl at group therapy.

episodes.name: Half Measures
episodes.overview: Against Walt's advice, Jesse lashes out. Fearing for Jesse's safety, Walt takes drastic action to intervene and tragic event leads to a shocking confrontation.

episodes.name: Full Measure
episodes.overview: With Jesse on the run and Mike in hot pursuit, Walt negotiates a bargain with Gus and concocts a disturbing plan to provide for his and Jesse's safety.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Walt and Jesse must cope with the fallout of their previous actions, both personally and professionally. Tension mounts as Walt faces a true standoff with his employer, Gus, with neither side willing or able to back down. Walt must also adjust to a new relationship with Skyler, whom while still reconciling her relationship with Walt, is committed to properly laundering Walt’s money and ensuring her sister Marie and an ailing Hank are financially stable.

episodes.name: Box Cutter
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse face the deadly consequences of their actions. Skyler deals with a puzzling disappearance, as Marie struggles to help Hank with his recovery.

episodes.name: Thirty-Eight Snub
episodes.overview: Walt attempts to form a new alliance as he plans his next move. Skyler pushes Walt towards a business opportunity, in hopes of protecting the family.

episodes.name: Open House
episodes.overview: Events spiral out of control at Jesse’s place. Skyler reluctantly asks for Saul’s help. Marie returns to an old pastime and a friend asks Hank for help.

episodes.name: Bullet Points
episodes.overview: The Cartel takes steps to gain the upper hand. Walt and Skyler share an embarrassing secret with the rest of the family. Jesse’s activities draw unwanted attention.

episodes.name: Shotgun
episodes.overview: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion. Hank shares some bad news with Detective Tim Roberts.

episodes.name: Cornered
episodes.overview: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walter, Jr. pushes his dad into a questionable purchase. Jesse offers Mike some unexpected help.

episodes.name: Problem Dog
episodes.overview: A frustrated Walt gambles on a risky new plan.  Skyler's business venture hits a snag.  Hank recruits Walter, Jr. for an unusual outing.

episodes.name: Hermanos
episodes.overview: Skyler develops an unusual solution to her money troubles. Hank enlists Walt to investigate a theory. Walt’s impatience with Jesse grows.

episodes.name: Bug
episodes.overview: Skyler's past mistakes come back to haunt her. Gus takes action to thwart his rivals. Jesse seeks Walt's help, with mixed results.

episodes.name: Salud
episodes.overview: Walt's family worries when he doesn't turn up for Walter, Jr.'s 16th birthday.  Jesse is forced to put his lab skills to the test without Mr. White's help.

episodes.name: Crawl Space
episodes.overview: Walt takes drastic action to protect his secret and Gus. Skyler's efforts to solve Ted's financial problems hit a wall.

episodes.name: End Times
episodes.overview: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue one last lead, while Walt struggles to protect the family. Jesse gets alarming news and rushes to meet with Mr. White.

episodes.name: Face Off
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul's help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Walt is faced with the prospect of moving on in a world without his enemy. As the pressure of a criminal life starts to build, Skyler struggles to keep Walt’s terrible secrets. Facing resistance from sometime adversary and former Fring lieutenant Mike, Walt tries to keep his world from falling apart even as his DEA Agent brother in law, Hank, finds numerous leads that could blaze a path straight to Walt.

episodes.name: Live Free or Die
episodes.overview: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.

episodes.name: Madrigal
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse pursue an unlikely business partner. The DEA filters through various leads in hopes of finding something.

episodes.name: Hazard Pay
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse formulate a new business plan. Walt shares a secret with Marie.

episodes.name: Fifty-One
episodes.overview: Walt celebrates another birthday. Skyler contemplates her options, and an associate puts a crimp in Walt and Jesse's business strategy.

episodes.name: Dead Freight
episodes.overview: Walt's team gets creative to obtain the methylamine they need to continue their operation.

episodes.name: Buyout
episodes.overview: Walt, Jesse, and Mike struggle over the future of their business, as occupational hazards weigh on Jesse.

episodes.name: Say My Name
episodes.overview: Walt takes control of business matters; Mike deals with the consequences of his actions.

episodes.name: Gliding Over All
episodes.overview: Walt takes care of loose ends; Walt makes a dangerous decision.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.

episodes.name: Buried
episodes.overview: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.

episodes.name: Confessions
episodes.overview: Jesse decides to make a change, while Walt and Skyler try to deal with an unexpected demand.

episodes.name: Rabid Dog
episodes.overview: An unusual strategy starts to bear fruit, while plans are set in motion that could change everything.

episodes.name: To'hajiilee
episodes.overview: Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways.

episodes.name: Ozymandias
episodes.overview: Everyone copes with radically changed circumstances.

episodes.name: Granite State
episodes.overview: Events set in motion long ago move toward a conclusion.

episodes.name: Felina
episodes.overview: All bad things must come to an end.

name: Arcane
overview: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two sisters. Two cities. One discovery that will change the world forever. In the cities of Piltover and Zaun, unrest stirs as inventors and thieves, politicians and crime lords chafe against the constraints of a society torn asunder.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Playground
episodes.overview: Orphaned sisters Vi and Powder bring trouble to Zaun's underground streets in the wake of a heist in posh Piltover.

episodes.name: Some Mysteries Are Better Left Unsolved
episodes.overview: Idealistic inventor Jayce attempts to harness magic through science—despite his mentor's warnings. Criminal kingpin Silco tests a powerful substance.

episodes.name: The Base Violence Necessary for Change
episodes.overview: An epic showdown between old rivals results in a fateful moment for Zaun. Jayce and Viktor risk it all for their research.

episodes.name: Happy Progress Day!
episodes.overview: With Piltover prospering from their tech, Jayce and Viktor weigh their next move. A familiar face re-emerges from Zaun to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Everybody Wants to Be My Enemy
episodes.overview: Rogue enforcer Caitlyn tours the undercity to track down Silco. Jayce puts a target on his back trying to root out Piltover corruption.

episodes.name: When These Walls Come Tumbling Down
episodes.overview: An eager protégé undermines his mentor on the council as a magical tech rapidly evolves. With authorities in pursuit, Jinx must face her past.

episodes.name: The Boy Savior
episodes.overview: Caitlyn and Vi meet an ally in Zaun’s streets and head into a frenzied battle with a common foe. Viktor makes a dire decision.

episodes.name: Oil and Water
episodes.overview: Disowned heir Mel and her visiting mother trade combat tactics. Caitlyn and Vi forge an unlikely alliance. Jinx undergoes a startling change.

episodes.name: The Monster You Created
episodes.overview: Perilously close to war, the leaders of Piltover and Zaun reach an ultimatum. But a fateful standoff changes both cities forever.

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
overview: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

seasons.name: Book One: Water
seasons.overview: Katara and Sokka (a brother and sister from the Southern Water Tribe) discover the Avatar (a 12-year-old Airbender boy named Aang) frozen in an iceberg. Together the three begin their journey to the North Pole to find a master waterbender so Aang can begin his Avatar training!

episodes.name: The Boy in the Iceberg
episodes.overview: Two teenage siblings (Sokka and Katara) living in the South Pole discover a very strange boy (Aang), along with his pet flying bison Appa, in an iceberg. But can they trust him when he accidentally draws the war to their village's doorstep?

episodes.name: The Avatar Returns
episodes.overview: Katara and Sokka discover that Aang is the long-lost Avatar and must rescue him when a Firebending prince named Zuko kidnaps him.

episodes.name: The Southern Air Temple
episodes.overview: Aang is excited about going home for the first time in one hundred years, but he is shocked to find out that the temple is deserted. Aang tells Sokka and Katara about his childhood as they explore the temple, but they soon discover something that Aang never expected. Meanwhile, Zuko must make repairs to his ship and the only way he can do it is to dock his ship at his rival's naval base.

episodes.name: The Warriors of Kyoshi
episodes.overview: The gang arrives at Kyoshi Island and are captured by some Kyoshi warriors. When Aang reveals that he is the avatar, news quickly spreads out, eventually reaching Zuko, who then goes to Kyoshi Island to capture him.

episodes.name: The King of Omashu
episodes.overview: Aang's abilities as an airbender are challenged by a king.

episodes.name: Imprisoned
episodes.overview: In a nearby Earth Village, the gang meets a teenage earthbender named Haru. This village lives in fear of the Fire Nation, for soldiers there capture any earthbenders they can find.

episodes.name: The Spirit World: Winter Solstice (1)
episodes.overview: Aang and friends visit a village being terrorized by an angry spirit. Iroh is captured by Earth Kingdom soldiers.

episodes.name: Avatar Roku: Winter Solstice (2)
episodes.overview: To contact the spirit of the previous Avatar, Aang must reach a temple in the Fire Nation before the sun sets on the following day. There he will learn what he must do to restore balance to the world. Zuko must defy his banishment to follow Aang.

episodes.name: The Waterbending Scroll
episodes.overview: After Katara attempts to teach Aang waterbending, but realizes that he is learning it much faster than she is, she is desperate to improve her abilities.  When Katara inadvertently stumbles across a waterbending scroll that can help improve her abilities at a pirate’s store, she decides to steal it, realizing that she couldn’t hope to afford it.

episodes.name: Jet
episodes.overview: While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation.  However, when a charismatic young man and his band of rebels attack the Fire Nation camp and rescue them, they learn that they are trying to resist the Fire Nation’s motives to expand their territory.  Katara and Aang really enjoy their time with the band of rebels, but Sokka soon discovers that they aren’t as noble as meets the eye.

episodes.name: The Great Divide
episodes.overview: While on their way to the North Pole, Aang and his friends arrive at a giant canyon where two groups of refugees are bickering over who should get to go across.  Aang decides to walk across with the two groups to ensure they don’t fight one another.  However, he soon learns that the two tribes have been feuding for one hundred years and they both believe their actions are justified.  But when the predators inside the canyon start to come out, Aang is stuck trying to defend both tribes from each other and the vicious wildlife.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: Aang, Katara and Sokka have run out of money.  Katara suggests Sokka get a job, and coincidentally, they meet a fisherman who is looking for someone to help him out with his fishing. But when the fisherman recognizes Aang as the Avatar, he blames Aang's absence for all of the troubles of the last 100 years, and Aang runs away on his glider. Katara follows on Appa, and when she finds him, Aang begins to reveal his life before he was frozen in the iceberg. Meanwhile, Zuko and Lieutenant Jee get into a fight, but Iroh breaks it up. Soon thereafter, the Lieutenant and the rest of the crew gain a newfound respect for their leader after learning of his past.

episodes.name: The Blue Spirit
episodes.overview: While Aang, Katara and Sokka are traveling, Sokka gets a fever. Katara and Aang try to help Sokka, when Katara also catches the fever. It's up to Aang to go up on his own to save his two friends. But before he can get the medicine he is captured by the newly promoted Admiral Zhao and put in Zhao's fortress.

episodes.name: The Fortuneteller
episodes.overview: When the group tries to help a man who is being attacked by a platypus-bear, they discover that the local town has a fortuneteller named Aunt Wu in it, who has been forecasting the town's fate for years. But when Sokka and Aang discover one of the fortuneteller's most vital predictions is dead wrong, they have to develop a plan to convince the stubborn townspeople that their beloved Aunt Wu was wrong.

episodes.name: Bato of the Water Tribe
episodes.overview: Aang feels neglected as Katara and Sokka reunite with Bato, an old friend of their father’s from the South Pole. They begin to reminisce on their times in the past while they wait for a message to arrive from their father. Aang believes Katara and Sokka will abandon him and go out to find their father should the message arrive. However, when the messenger gives Aang the message to give to Bato, Aang betrays his friends in a way Katara or Sokka could never imagine. However, when Zuko recruits a bounty hunter named June to track Aang down, his friendship is put to the test as he must deal with the fact that he betrayed his friends while defending himself from yet another fight.

episodes.name: The Deserter
episodes.overview: Aang and his friends go to a Fire Nation town so that Aang can witness some firebending, but their plan soon goes awry when it’s discovered that he is the Avatar. Fortunately, he's rescued by an individual who serves a firebending master named Jeong Jeong who has abandoned the Fire Nation, so Aang decides to use this time to attempt to learn firebending. The firebending master, however, seems reluctant to teach Aang.

episodes.name: The Northern Air Temple
episodes.overview: When Aang and his friends hear rumors about surviving airbenders, they decide to stop by the Northern Air Temple on their way to the North Pole to see for themselves. What they find is a bunch of people who are not airbenders, but have mastered the art of gliding; though this upsets Aang because they have been defacing the temple. However, there was one part of the temple where nobody has been able to enter, and what Aang and his friends discover inside spells oncoming conflict.

episodes.name: The Waterbending Master
episodes.overview: When Aang tries to find the north pole, he is found by the north pole instead. As they are taken there, Aang and Katara are eager to find a waterbending master, only to discover that girls are not allowed to learn waterbending.

episodes.name: The Siege of the North (1)
episodes.overview: Zhao begins to launch his attack against the Northern Water Tribe. As the walls of the prestiged city begin to fall, the Avatar taps into the spirit world and seeks the help of one of the oldest spirits, in hopes of saving one of the most prominent areas of the world.

episodes.name: The Siege of the North (2)
episodes.overview: Aang returns from the spirit world to a big surprise. Meanwhile, Zhao and his forces continue to press deeper into the Northern Water Tribe. Iroh makes a powerful stand and Zuko struggles to keep his plan intact.

seasons.name: Book Two: Earth
seasons.overview: Aang, along with Katara, Sokka, and their animal friends Appa and Momo, continues on his quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar. According to the Avatar cycle, the group must now enter the Earth Kingdom to search for a master earthbender to teach Aang.

episodes.name: The Avatar State
episodes.overview: Plagued with nightmares featuring the devastating power of his Avatar State, Aang and the gang meet an Earth Kingdom general who has big plans for defeating the Fire Nation. Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh, having survived the failed attack on the North Water Tribe, have a surprise visit from Zuko's sister with seemingly good news.

episodes.name: The Cave of Two Lovers
episodes.overview: On their way to Omashu, Aang, Katara, and Sokka meet a group of nomads who show them a shortcut through the "Cave of Two Lovers". But when the group becomes trapped in the cave, it's up to Aang and Katara to save the group by trusting in love, possibly questioning their relationship. Meanwhile, Iroh gets a lethal rash so Zuko and Iroh head to a small Earth Kingdom town for help, hoping their real identities will not be discovered.

episodes.name: Return to Omashu
episodes.overview: Despite the shocking news the gang have just discovered, Aang insists on trying to find King Bumi within Omashu's borders, even with the dangers that will await him and his friends if his real identity is discovered.  Meanwhile Azula goes in search of old friends to help her with her mission.

episodes.name: The Swamp
episodes.overview: A mysterious tornado pulls the kids into a supernatural swamp where Katara, Sokka and Aang have mysterious visions. Meanwhile, Momo and Appa are chased by rogue swamp dwellers and only Aang and the gang can save them.

episodes.name: Avatar Day
episodes.overview: Aang and the gang discover an Earth town that celebrates something called "Avatar Day." But when they get there and learn the festival is of "anti-Avatar" sentiment and Aang is put on trial for a crime a past incarnation allegedly committed. Looking to clear the Avatar's good name, Katara and Sokka venture back to a familiar  place to gather evidence and discover the truth.

episodes.name: The Blind Bandit
episodes.overview: In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament called Earth Rumble 6, where they encounter Toph, a blind but powerful Earthbending girl. After seeing her unique style of Earthbending, Aang wants Toph to become his teacher, but there are complications with Toph's family.

episodes.name: Zuko Alone
episodes.overview: Zuko travels by himself to an Earth Kingdom town were he meets a local boy. The two almost become friends, while Zuko suffers from flashbacks of his past.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: Tired from trying to escape a machine that shows up every time they try to sleep, Aang and the gang have to escape Azula and her team, but their exhaustion leads to a tight situation. Meanwhile, Zuko must deal with something personal, and Iroh bonds with an unlikely individual.

episodes.name: Bitter Work
episodes.overview: Toph's instructing abilities come into question when Aang cannot seem to overcome a block that keeps him from earthbending. Sokka gets himself in a jam, while befriending what was, moments before, his next meal, and Iroh and Zuko begin training utilizing new philosophies and methods that originate from the other elements.

episodes.name: The Library
episodes.overview: When Aang and his friends find a professor who knows of a library that contains information about the world, Sokka decides to go there to hopefully find some information to use against the Fire Nation. The library is guarded by the knowledge spirit, Wan Shi Tong, who doesn't welcome humans into his library, because he believes they only seek information for evil purposes. When Wan Shi Tong discovers Sokka wasn't being truthful with him, he begins to sink the library, bringing the kids down with it.

episodes.name: The Desert
episodes.overview: Aang searches for Appa while Katara struggles to keep everyone together to survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Iroh and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

episodes.name: The Serpent's Pass
episodes.overview: When Aang and the gang meet up with a group of refugees, they tell the gang where they can get on a ferry to Ba Sing Se. But after a series of events they have to take a deadly route called the serpent's pass with the help of an old friend, Suki. Meanwhile Zuko and Iroh meet up with a boy named Jet and his freedom fighters.

episodes.name: The Drill
episodes.overview: Having made it to the outer wall of Ba Sing Se, the kids confront a Fire Nation army that is driving a massive Fire Nation drill, which poses an imminent threat to the last Earth Kingdom stronghold. Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh make crucial mistakes which begin to attract Jet's suspicions.

episodes.name: City of Walls and Secrets
episodes.overview: Having finally made it into Ba Sing Se, the kids are given a house in the upper ring. The kids are anxious to tell the Earth King their plan but there are complications. Meanwhile, still convinced that Iroh and Zuko may be Fire Nation, Jet decides to take matters into his own hands and do whatever it takes to get the refugees to reveal their true nature.

episodes.name: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
episodes.overview: A series of short stories, highlighting different characters and their individual adventures in the city. Tales of Katara and Toph, Iroh, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

episodes.name: Appa's Lost Days
episodes.overview: Appa's journey from being abducted in the desert to the present is explored.

episodes.name: Lake Laogai
episodes.overview: Aang and his friends continue to search for Appa and, unbeknownst to them, they aren't the only ones looking for him. During their search, the kids meet up with Jet, whom they are understandably reluctant to trust. The kids soon realize that the Dai Li are doing their best to thwart the kids' efforts to find Appa. Meanwhile, Iroh is offered his own tea shop in the upper ring, and Zuko discovers the avatar is in the city.

episodes.name: The Earth King
episodes.overview: The kids battle Long Feng and the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

episodes.name: The Guru
episodes.overview: Aang travels to the Eastern Air temple to receive guidance from Guru Pathik while Sokka is reunited with his long-lost father. Meanwhile, Azula has something diabolical in store for her enemies in the Earth Kingdom, including Zuko and Iroh.

episodes.name: The Crossroads of Destiny
episodes.overview: Everyone races against time to stop Azula's sinister plan. Zuko finds companionship in an unlikely source. Aang's destiny hangs in the balance—and so does Zuko's, as Iroh tells him it's time to make a choice.

seasons.name: Book Three: Fire
seasons.overview: Aang wakes up from his battle with Azula to discover that Ba Sing Se has fallen and the world thinks he's dead. So he and his friends set off undercover across the Fire Nation to find Fire Lord Ozai before the Day of Black Sun. Prince Zuko returns home as the triumphant son, but soon finds the honor he so greatly craved from his father is worthless. New alliances are formed and Team Avatar forges a new plan to stop the Fire Lord. But will they find him in time?

episodes.name: The Awakening
episodes.overview: Aang awakens to find himself aboard a captured Fire Nation ship with a full head of hair and sustaining serious injuries from the previous battle for Ba Sing Se. At his side are Katara, Sokka, and their father Hakoda who recount the events that led the four to the ship and contemplate their next move. Aang struggles to fight his own desire to face the Fire Lord before he is ready. Meanwhile, Zuko deals with his own issues as he makes his long-awaited journey home, with the fear of his father's rejection hanging over his head.

episodes.name: The Headband
episodes.overview: To better blend in as Fire Nation citizens, Aang enrolls in a Fire Nation school, giving himself an opportunity to learn more about the Nation and to enjoy life as a normal kid for the first time since he discovered he was the Avatar. Meanwhile Zuko, growing more and more paranoid about the Avatar's false demise, brings himself to confront the imprisoned Iroh.

episodes.name: The Painted Lady
episodes.overview: When the gang arrives at a suffering fishing village, a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

episodes.name: Sokka's Master
episodes.overview: Feeling as though he isn't contributing enough to the group, Sokka seeks out an elusive swordsmaster from whom he can learn the ways of the blade.

episodes.name: The Beach
episodes.overview: Zuko, Azula, Mai and Ty Lee take a vacation to Ember Island. In the process, they come to learn more about themselves and each other as well as their desires for the future. Elsewhere, Aang and the others face off against a new adversary.

episodes.name: The Avatar and the Firelord
episodes.overview: The tale of Avatar Roku and Fire Lord Sozin is revealed to Aang and Zuko by different sources.  Both learn about themselves and are shown the origins of the war.

episodes.name: The Runaway
episodes.overview: When Katara expresses her disapproval of Toph's new way to make quick cash, the group finds her too motherly and tension grows between Katara and Toph. When Katara finally decides to participate in this scam to disprove Toph's accusations, they are left vulnerable and are forced to face the dire consequences.

episodes.name: The Puppetmaster
episodes.overview: The gang investigates the bizarre disappearances taking place within an eerie town.

episodes.name: Nightmares and Daydreams
episodes.overview: Four days prior the invasion, Aang becomes nervous over his soon-to-come confrontation with the Fire Lord. His anxiety gets the better of him as he begins to suffer from outrageous nightmares and hallucinations. Meanwhile, Zuko becomes upset to learn that he was not informed about a war meeting.

episodes.name: The Day of Black Sun: The Invasion (1)
episodes.overview: The day of the eclipse has arrived, and the invasion force gathers together to make last preparations. They infiltrate the island and the battle begins. Meanwhile, Aang searches for the Fire Lord.

episodes.name: The Day of Black Sun: The Eclipse (2)
episodes.overview: As the invasion force fights their way to the Fire Nation capital, the kids help Aang find the Fire Lord in time for the eclipse. Zuko confronts his father with shocking news.

episodes.name: The Western Air Temple
episodes.overview: Aang and the group arrive at the Western Air Temple, with Zuko in pursuit. Zuko wishes to help the Avatar end the war by teaching him firebending.

episodes.name: The Firebending Masters
episodes.overview: While teaching Aang firebending, Zuko realizes that he has lost all his firebending skills. To regain his powers, Zuko and Aang must seek the original source of firebending within the ruins of a lost civilization.

episodes.name: The Boiling Rock (1)
episodes.overview: Sokka wants to break his father out of jail and asks Zuko for information on Fire Nation prisons. Sokka and Zuko head for the Boiling Rock, a prison located in the middle of a volcano, to rescue Sokka's father.

episodes.name: The Boiling Rock (2)
episodes.overview: Zuko and Sokka make new plans to break out of the prison with Suki, Sokka's father and some others while a shocking twist leaves Azula none too happy with her two closest friends.

episodes.name: The Southern Raiders
episodes.overview: Katara decides to confront the Fire Nation soldier responsible for her mother's death. Aang tries to talk her out of it, but she doesn't listen.

episodes.name: The Ember Island Players
episodes.overview: A play recounting the gang's adventures does not sit well with Aang and his friends, except for Toph who enjoys it very much. Meanwhile, Aang confesses his love to Katara, but the response is ambiguous.

episodes.name: Sozin's Comet: The Phoenix King (1)
episodes.overview: Aang struggles to decide whether or not he has to kill the Fire Lord and, during the night, is drawn toward an island which disappears before morning. Zuko leads the rest of the group to the Earth Kingdom to meet a tracker whom they hope can find Aang. The Fire Lord crowns himself Phoenix King and Aang awakens on the island not knowing where he is.

episodes.name: Sozin's Comet: The Old Masters (2)
episodes.overview: While on the island, Aang seeks guidance from his past lives, but is not pleased with what he is told. The island, in fact, turns out to be a lion turtle from which Aang is given the guidance he had been seeking. After the tracker is unable to track Aang, the rest of the group decide they must find Iroh. Meanwhile, while tracking down Iroh, the group meets up with The Order of the White Lotus, a group that transcends the division of the four nations.

episodes.name: Sozin's Comet: Into the Inferno (3)
episodes.overview: Sokka, Suki, and Toph try to stop the Fire Nation's air fleet. Meanwhile, Zuko and Azula duel in an Agni Kai and Aang confronts the Fire Lord. On the verge of losing, Aang gets hit in the back of his scar which sends him into the Avatar State.

episodes.name: Sozin's Comet: Avatar Aang (4)
episodes.overview: Aang defeats the Fire Lord by bending the elements within the Fire Lord and removing his firebending abilities. After Zuko is taken down protecting Katara from Azula, Katara joins the fight and manages to restrain Azula. Afterwards, Zuko is crowned Fire Lord and promises a better future for the world, while Aang takes his place as the next Avatar. Katara finally shows her love for Aang as they kiss under the setting sun.

name: Rick and Morty
overview: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty's already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Rick and Morty visit a pawn shop in space, encounter various alternate and virtual realities, and meet the devil at his antique shop.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Rick moves in with his daughter's family and establishes himself as a bad influence on his grandson, Morty.

episodes.name: Lawnmower Dog
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty try to incept Morty's math teacher into giving Morty an 'A'.  Meanwhile, Rick gives Jerry a device to train their dog, Snuffles.

episodes.name: Anatomy Park
episodes.overview: Christmas day, Rick's friend, Reuben, comes over for his annual medical checkup.  Meanwhile Jerry learns his parents have a new friend.

episodes.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery in this M. Night Shyamalan style twistaroony of an episode!

episodes.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
episodes.overview: When Morty thinks Rick's adventures are too dangerous, he challenges Rick to let him lead one instead.

episodes.name: Rick Potion #9
episodes.overview: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get his dream girl, only for the serum to backfire and create a living Cronenberg nightmare.

episodes.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
episodes.overview: Morty convinces Rick to buy him a sexy robot.  Later Rick and Summer spend some quality time together.

episodes.name: Rixty Minutes
episodes.overview: Rick hacks the cable box, but the family are distracted by another one of his inventions.

episodes.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
episodes.overview: Rick battles the devil and upsets Summer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Morty hang out.

episodes.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty have a falling out when Rick is approached by some familiar associates.

episodes.name: Ricksy Business
episodes.overview: Beth and Jerry go away on a trip, so Rick decides to throw a party.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After Rick and Morty decided to unfreeze time, they must deal with alien parasites, alternate Jerrys and a decaying, possibly non-existent dimension.

episodes.name: A Rickle in Time
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty, and Summer get into trouble when time is fractured by a feedback loop of uncertainty that split reality into more than one equally possible impossibilities. Meanwhile, Beth and Jerry go to extreme lengths to save a deer struck by their vehicle.

episodes.name: Mortynight Run
episodes.overview: Rick teaches Morty to drive while leaving Jerry at a popular day care made just for him. Morty's conscience has him hunt down an assassin rather than spending the day at an alien arcade.

episodes.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
episodes.overview: Rick gets emotionally invested when meeting an old friend, while Beth and Jerry have a falling out after making a discovery under the garage.

episodes.name: Total Rickall
episodes.overview: Trapped inside the house with an ever-increasing number of parasitic alien shape-shifters capable of altering memories, an uncertain Rick and the Smiths search for a way to determine which of them are real.

episodes.name: Get Schwifty
episodes.overview: When a massive head descends into Earth's atmosphere, Rick and Morty must save the planet by coming up with a new hit song. Meanwhile, Jerry, Beth, and Summer become part of a new religion.

episodes.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty travel inside the car's battery, where Morty discovers Rick has created a universe containing sentient life solely to produce power for him. Meanwhile, Summer must deal with being locked in the car with Rick's overzealous security system.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
episodes.overview: Rick joins in on hijinks while Beth and Jerry sort out relationship issues.

episodes.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
episodes.overview: Jerry gets sick, and Rick sparks up the TV.

episodes.name: Look Who's Purging Now
episodes.overview: Morty makes a mistake and Jerry and Summer work on their father-daughter relationship.

episodes.name: The Wedding Squanchers
episodes.overview: The whole family makes mistakes.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Rick and Morty travel to Atlantis and take some time to relax, plus Rick turns himself into a pickle and faces off against the president.

episodes.name: The Rickshank Rickdemption
episodes.overview: The Smith family tries to cope without Rick, which is painful enough on its own without taking into consideration the stifling rules put into place by the Federation. Meanwhile Rick's past is finally revealed as he attempts to get out of his prison

episodes.name: Rickmancing the Stone
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty and Summer travel to a post-apocalyptic dimension and meet some dangerous enemies.

episodes.name: Pickle Rick
episodes.overview: It's family therapy time in this one broh. Classic stuff. Pickle Rick too.

episodes.name: Vindicators 3: The Return of Worldender
episodes.overview: Action and heroes.

episodes.name: The Whirly Dirly Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Rick and Jerry goes on an adventure while Beth fails as a mother and Summer has body issues.

episodes.name: Rest and Ricklaxation
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty need a break.

episodes.name: The Ricklantis Mixup
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty head to Atlantis. Meanwhile, the Citadel of Ricks undergoes major changes under new leadership.

episodes.name: Morty's Mind Blowers
episodes.overview: Morty's memories are restored and we learn the truth in this one broh.

episodes.name: The ABC's of Beth
episodes.overview: Jerry pulls in some lady in this one broh. Beth revisits her childhood.

episodes.name: The Rickchurian Mortydate
episodes.overview: Rick goes toe to toe with the President in this one broh.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Everything and nothing makes sense when bizarre genius Rick and his grandson Morty take more interdimensional journeys that bend time and space.

episodes.name: Edge of Tomorty: Rick Die Rickpeat
episodes.overview: Rick brings Morty to a planet containing crystals that show whoever is touching them all the ways they may die depending on their choices.

episodes.name: The Old Man and the Seat
episodes.overview: Jerry works on an app with an alien despite Rick's warning not to and Morty's objections. Rick tracks down his own manure mystery.

episodes.name: One Crew Over the Crewcoo's Morty
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty raid a tomb, only to find that the heist artist Miles Knightley has beaten them to it.

episodes.name: Claw and Hoarder: Special Ricktim's Morty
episodes.overview: After a particularly harrowing adventure, Rick gives Morty his own dragon.

episodes.name: Rattlestar Ricklactica
episodes.overview: Morty gets bitten by a space snake. Jerry tries to prove he can survive without Rick's help.

episodes.name: Never Ricking Morty
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty find themselves on a space train that's one big narrative device.

episodes.name: Promortyus
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty find themselves in a fight against face-hugging aliens who just happen to have an M&Ms store.

episodes.name: The Vat of Acid Episode
episodes.overview: It's a Rick, Morty and a vat of acid kind of adventure. But will it be worth Morty missing his English class for?

episodes.name: Childrick of Mort
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty, Beth, Summer and Jerry share a galactic adventure.

episodes.name: Star Mort Rickturn of the Jerri
episodes.overview: An adventure with an invisibility belt, but a family that disappears together, must stay together.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Hold onto your butts — it’s season five, baby! Rick, Morty and the fam are back with ten all-new episodes that consume unheld butts. Sex, romance, testicle monsters… a guy named Mr. Nimbus… It’s everything you want, get your butt ready!

episodes.name: Mort Dinner Rick Andre
episodes.overview: Rick hosts dinner for his ocean-dwelling nemesis, while Morty gets the wine.

episodes.name: Mortyplicity
episodes.overview: The Smiths suspect they're being hunted. But who's even real?

episodes.name: A Rickconvenient Mort
episodes.overview: Morty falls in love with an environmental superhero, while Rick and Summer go on an apocalypse bar crawl.

episodes.name: Rickdependence Spray
episodes.overview: A failed Rick experiment creates monsters that threaten the country.

episodes.name: Amortycan Grickfitti
episodes.overview: Summer and Morty steal Rick's car to impress a new kid at school. Rick and Jerry have a guys' night from hell.

episodes.name: Rick & Morty's Thanksploitation Spectacular
episodes.overview: On Thanksgiving, Rick and Morty need to get a presidential pardon.

episodes.name: Gotron Jerrysis Rickvangelion
episodes.overview: Summer enables Rick's addiction to collecting giant combining robots, and the family becomes The Family.

episodes.name: Rickternal Friendshine of the Spotless Mort
episodes.overview: Rick attempts to save a beloved friend.

episodes.name: Forgetting Sarick Mortshall
episodes.overview: Rick gets new sidekicks, while Morty makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Rickmurai Jack
episodes.overview: Rick is living his best anime life, making new friends and taking down new enemies.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: It’s season six and Rick and Morty are back! Pick up where we left them, worse for wear and down on their luck. Will they manage to bounce back for more adventures? Or will they get swept up in an ocean of piss! Who knows?! Piss! Family! Intrigue! A bunch of dinosaurs! More piss! Another can’t miss season of your favorite show.

episodes.name: Solaricks
episodes.overview: The Smiths deal with last season's fallout, and Rick and Morty are stranded in space.

episodes.name: Rick: A Mort Well Lived
episodes.overview: Morty is trapped and Rick needs to save him, but to do so, Summer must do a Die Hard.

episodes.name: Bethic Twinstinct
episodes.overview: Summer and Morty lock into their new ultra-realistic video game console.

episodes.name: Night Family
episodes.overview: The family discover Rick has been using some new technology that they want to try too. After obliging, classic Rick and Morty chaos ensues.

episodes.name: Final DeSmithation
episodes.overview: The Smiths dine at their favorite Chinese restaurant and read their fortune cookies aloud. Pretty normal stuff - until Jerry reads his.

episodes.name: JuRicksic Mort
episodes.overview: Out of the blue, Earth's old rulers return. They make a great case for changing the way society works, but Rick isn't going to put up with it.

episodes.name: Full Meta Jackrick
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty find themselves confused. They remember some of their adventures together, which leads them to a stand-off with an old enemy.

episodes.name: Analyze Piss
episodes.overview: Funny and random characters start popping up more and more. Rick is exhausted from having to deal with them. What does this mean for him?

episodes.name: A Rick in King Mortur's Mort
episodes.overview: Morty receives a gift from a random stranger on the street.

episodes.name: Ricktional Mortpoon's Rickmas Mortcation
episodes.overview: Morty's always wanted a certain gift for Christmas, but never gets it...

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Rick and Morty are back and sounding more like themselves than ever! It's season seven, and the possibilities are endless: what's up with Jerry? EVIL Summer?! And will they ever go back to the high school?! Maybe not! But let's find out! There's probably less piss than last season. "Rick and Morty," 100 years! Or at least until season 10!

episodes.name: How Poopy Got His Poop Back
episodes.overview: Rick tries to help a friend get back on his feet.

episodes.name: The Jerrick Trap
episodes.overview: Rick teaches Jerry that he works smarter, not harder.

episodes.name: Air Force Wong
episodes.overview: Rick and the President are back at it.

episodes.name: That's Amorte
episodes.overview: Rick shares his secret recipe with the family.

episodes.name: Unmortricken
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty get stuck on a project.

episodes.name: Rickfending Your Mort
episodes.overview: Morty gets audited.

episodes.name: Wet Kuat Amortican Summer
episodes.overview: Summer and Morty spend time together with friends.

episodes.name: Rise of the Numbericons: The Movie
episodes.overview: Our heroes realize that math is hard, but saving the universe is harder.

episodes.name: Mort: Ragnarick
episodes.overview: Rick seeks the infinite. Morty tries to help.

episodes.name: Fear No Mort
episodes.overview: A jaded Rick and Morty seek spooky thrills.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
original_name: 鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST
overview: Disregard for alchemy’s laws ripped half of Edward Elric’s limbs from his body and left his brother Alphonse’s soul clinging to a suit of armor. To restore what was lost, the brothers seek the Philosopher’s Stone. Enemies and allies – the corrupt military, the Homunculi, and foreign alchemists – will alter the Elric brothers course, but their purpose will remain unchanged and their bond unbreakable.

episodes.name: Fullmetal Alchemist
episodes.overview: After escaping from Central Prison, the Freezing Alchemist, Isaac McDougal, sets his plan in motion to kill Führer King Bradley. However, under the command of Lt. Col. Roy Mustang, the military and State Alchemists attempt to stop him.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.overview: On the way to Lior, Ed and Al reminisce about the events that lead to them being trapped in their current bodies by breaking the taboo of human transmutation. Meanwhile, Colonel Mustang looks back on the first time he met the Elric brothers.

episodes.name: City of Heresy
episodes.overview: Ed and Al arrive at the city of Lior, hoping to find the legendary Philosopher's Stone so they can return their bodies back to normal. There, they meet a priest named Cornello, who is able to perform "miracles." As Ed and Al investigate, they find out the truth about Cornello.

episodes.name: An Alchemist's Anguish
episodes.overview: Ed and Al become interested in biological transmutation after witnessing a chimera in Lior, so Colonel Mustang introduces them to an expert in the field, Shou Tucker, the Life-binding Alchemist. Meanwhile, a serial killer whose targets are only State Alchemists is on the loose in Central.

episodes.name: Rain of Sorrows
episodes.overview: After learning about what happened to Shou Tucker and his daughter Nina, the Elric brothers begin to question what alchemy really is. Meanwhile, Colonel Mustang and the other State Alchemists track down the serial killer Scar.

episodes.name: Road of Hope
episodes.overview: After their encounter with Scar, Ed's automail and Al's armor need to be repaired, so Major Armstrong escorts them to their hometown of Risembool. On their way there, they spot Dr. Marcoh, a scientist who helped create the Philosopher's Stone, and try to convince him to give them the location of the Stone's research data.

episodes.name: Hidden Truths
episodes.overview: When Ed and Al arrive at the Central Library they discover that it has been burnt to the ground and instead are taken to see Sheska, a former employee who may have the information they seek. Meanwhile, in East City an unexplained explosion causes Colonel Mustang to restart his search for Scar.

episodes.name: The Fifth Laboratory
episodes.overview: Ed and Al sneak inside the Fifth Laboratory to search for more answers about the origins of the Philosopher's Stone. However, it is not long before they are each attacked by former death row murderers who now guard the complex.

episodes.name: Created Feelings
episodes.overview: Ed is now in a hospital recovering from his wounds and Al is unable to let go of what Number 66 told him back at the Fifth Laboratory. Meanwhile, Winry agrees to make a trip to Central in order to repair Ed's automail... again!

episodes.name: Separate Destinations
episodes.overview: When the conspiracy surrounding the Philosopher's Stone closes in on the highest ranks of the military, one of Mustang's most trusted and cherished allies is murdered.

episodes.name: Miracle at Rush Valley
episodes.overview: The Elrics, realizing alchemy has yet to unlock the mysteries of creating life, feel powerless when a new friend goes into labor. Winry, however, jumps into action with a young thief named Paninya.

episodes.name: One is All, All is One
episodes.overview: While visiting Izumi, their childhood teacher, the Elrics recall the early difficulties of grasping equivalent exchange. They also discover she shares their intimate knowledge of alchemy's greatest taboo.

episodes.name: Beasts of Dublith
episodes.overview: Al is abducted by chimeras led by the seemingly indestructible Homunculus known as Greed. When Ed's rescue attempt falls short, Izumi proves once more that she's got the brothers' best interests in mind.

episodes.name: Those Who Lurk Underground
episodes.overview: In a violent clash with Greed, King Bradley proves to be a brutal opponent. But the man who finally destroys the Ultimate Shield is more powerful than even the Fuhrer himself.

episodes.name: Envoy from the East
episodes.overview: The Elrics scuffle with Ling Yao and his attendants, Lan Fan and Fu, visitors from Xing seeking the Philosopher's Stone. Ed may not like him, but Ling Yao's not leaving until he gets what he wants.

episodes.name: Footsteps of a Comrade-in-Arms
episodes.overview: After learning of Hughes's fate, Ed and Al are ravaged by sadness and guilt. Envy still hides in plain sight among the State Alchemists, and another Homunculus is on the verge of infiltrating their ranks as well.

episodes.name: Cold Flame
episodes.overview: Freed by an unlikely liberator, Ross's escape is interrupted by Mustang. Even those most loyal to the Flame Alchemist are shaken by the controversial action he takes against the accused killer of Maes Hughes.

episodes.name: The Arrogant Palm of a Small Human
episodes.overview: Ed's journey to a distant land of legend offers surprising new details behind Mustang's alleyway encounter with Ross. After a fateful encounter of his own, Elric learns a stunning secret about Winry's parents.

episodes.name: Death of the Undying
episodes.overview: Mustang, Alphonse, Havoc, and Hawkeye split up to search a military laboratory. If Lust has her way, none of them will ever see each other alive again.

episodes.name: Father Before the Grave
episodes.overview: Hohenheim's visit ends with a grave warning to Pinako, but Ed finds hope among the charred ruins of his childhood. Now more than ever, he has confidence that Al can be returned to his body.

episodes.name: Advance of the Fool
episodes.overview: Hoping to learn more about the Homunculi, Ed and Al devise a risky strategy to lure the creatures out of hiding. Step one of the brothers' plan: risk death at the hands of their most dangerous enemy - Scar.

episodes.name: Backs in the Distance
episodes.overview: Scar's mission to destroy those who slaughtered his people is fueled by justifiable rage. Upon learning the role Scar played in her parents' deaths, Winry claims those murderous feelings as her own.

episodes.name: Girl on the Battlefield
episodes.overview: Cooperation between Mustang's cabal and Ling Yao's band leads to the capture of a Homunculus. Unfortunately, their actions also capture the eye of the Homunculus hiding atop the military's ranks.

episodes.name: Inside the Belly
episodes.overview: Gluttony's twisted powers overwhelm the Elrics - and the creature's appetite is satisfied by battle's end. Meanwhile, Mustang acts on his suspicions of Bradley and finds himself in the belly of the beast.

episodes.name: Doorway of Darkness
episodes.overview: The Homunculi are winning. Ed and Ling face a horrific enemy within the hellish expanse of Gluttony's gut. In Central, Mustang can only watch as his loyal band of soldiers is divided by Bradley.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Truths are exposed when Al finds the one called Father, and Mustang hears the tale of Bradley's creation - but the most amazing revelation is reserved for Ed after he once again breaks alchemy's greatest taboo.

episodes.name: Interlude Party
episodes.overview: Visions of the past play out by a warming fire as Hohenheim reflects on the unavoidable follies of man: the pain that comes with a loving family; the hidden truths of alchemy; and the roots and results of war.

episodes.name: Father
episodes.overview: The Elrics come face to face with Father - and his face is familiar indeed. Powerless and amazed, Ed and Al can only watch as Father creates a new Homunculus with alchemy that should be impossible.

episodes.name: Struggle of the Fool
episodes.overview: The Elrics are at Bradley's mercy; if the brothers make one wrong move, those dearest to them will pay. As Mustang quietly gathers allies at his side, Ed discovers there may be no need to find a Philosopher's Stone.

episodes.name: The Ishvalan War of Extermination
episodes.overview: As Edward hears Hawkeye's tale of a time when idealistic young soldiers were tasked with genocide, the horrors of the Ishvalan battlefield are revealed.

episodes.name: The 520 Cens Promise
episodes.overview: Even as his subordinates are scattered, Mustang finds he still has allies - unfortunately, so do his enemies. The Homunculi unleash one of the Ishvalan War's most notorious killers to deal with Scar and Marcoh.

episodes.name: The Führer's Son
episodes.overview: A secret encounter allows Mustang to spark new ambition in an old friend - an ally with loyal troops at his command. Meanwhile, Ed and Al share a chance meeting with their biggest fan - young Selim Bradley.

episodes.name: The Northern Wall of Briggs
episodes.overview: The frigid northern borderlands become a battlefield when Kimblee finally closes in on Scar. Deeper into the frozen wasteland, Ed and Al's fight is against the bitter elements as they struggle to reach Fort Briggs.

episodes.name: Ice Queen
episodes.overview: The soldiers at Fort Briggs remain ever vigilant against the threat of spies from Drachma. The massive compound may seem impenetrable - but a violent intruder offers destructive proof to the contrary.

episodes.name: The Shape of This Country
episodes.overview: Ed uncovers a conspiracy of staggering scope: a plot that has already claimed countless victims. Clues suggest that Fort Briggs will soon know bloodshed - and an entire nation will suffer.

episodes.name: Family Portrait
episodes.overview: As Raven tries to corrupt Armstrong, Ed and Al can only wait in their cell. Long ago, their father faced his own captivity, confined to an eternity of regret in an undying body. To escape the pain, he said goodbye.

episodes.name: The First Homunculus
episodes.overview: Hawkeye is shocked when the first Homunculus reveals itself. Far away, Edward is surprised by an offer from Kimblee: Fullmetal can have all he has searched for - in exchange for becoming a mass murderer.

episodes.name: Conflict at Baschool
episodes.overview: When Scar is cornered by a pair of gruesome chimeras, the Elrics enter the fray as his unlikely allies. Later, Winry's attempt to confront Scar over his role in her parent's death ends in disaster.

episodes.name: Daydream
episodes.overview: The ruse of Winry's abduction by Scar is revealed, but a plan of rescue must still be hatched. A brutal storm is coming - one which only Alphonse Elric can brave.

episodes.name: Homunculus (The Dwarf in the Flask)
episodes.overview: Long ago, the blood of a simple slave was used in an experiment which created a strange, shapeless being. In exchange for the gift of existence, the being gave the slave a name - and cursed him with immortality.

episodes.name: The Abyss
episodes.overview: Bound by more than blood, the Elrics have long shared joy and pain. Now, with Al wandering the frigid void - and Ed losing blood by Kimblee's hand - the mystical connection of their souls could prove fatal.

episodes.name: Signs of a Counteroffensive
episodes.overview: May and Marcoh's efforts to decode the research of Scar's brother yield progress, but it might be too late to prevent catastrophe. Violence is spreading across the land, and it will soon reach the northern border.

episodes.name: Bite of the Ant
episodes.overview: In the snowy north, the soldiers of Fort Briggs engage an invading army, and Marcoh leads an attack against monstrous Envy. In Central, an ominous and shocking secret is revealed to Olivier Armstrong.

episodes.name: Revving at Full Throttle
episodes.overview: Hohenheim and Alphonse enjoy a chance to get reacquainted. Their bond is restored with ease, inspiring the father to share his secrets with his sons - but one of them is far away and on the run.

episodes.name: The Promised Day
episodes.overview: Quiet warnings spread near and far: the Promised Day is at hand. While most will face the coming chaos with their own kind, Edward forms a new cabal comprised of human, chimera - and Homunculus.

episodes.name: Looming Shadows
episodes.overview: Those who have prepared to reclaim a nation find their plans exposed. The chaos multiplies after an assassin strikes down a mighty leader in broad daylight, and Alphonse falls prey to monsters in the dark.

episodes.name: Emissary of Darkness
episodes.overview: A sinister voice rings out from the shell of Al's armor, and Ed and Greed find themselves under attack. As the Homunculi use the darkness to their advantage, a face from the past arrives to join the battle.

episodes.name: The Oath in the Tunnel
episodes.overview: After investigating the twisted roots of the Bradley family tree, Mustang gathers his most loyal troops. Meanwhile, Ed and his allies continue fighting Selim, who shocks everyone by turning on his own kind.

episodes.name: Filial Affection
episodes.overview: With his father's help, Al takes incredible steps to contain the monstrous Pride. As the sun begins to rise on the Promised Day, the youngest Elric listens while the Homunculus ponders his very human mother.

episodes.name: Upheaval in Central
episodes.overview: Mustang leads a ragtag assault force of hardy northern troops - and welcome faces from the past - against Central's defenses. Victory seems certain until the military's most horrifying secret is revealed.

episodes.name: The Immortal Legion
episodes.overview: Ed's crew faces a horde of ravenous mannequins, abominations powered by human souls. The twisted creatures aren't the only unstoppable force on the battlefield -Pride, Sloth, and Envy are on the move.

episodes.name: Combined Strength
episodes.overview: With a Philosopher's Stone in his possession, Alphonse fearlessly engages Pride and Kimblee. Elsewhere, the Armstrongs find themselves trapped between Sloth's onslaught and the guns of Central's troops.

episodes.name: Flame of Vengeance
episodes.overview: After a startling radio broadcast grants Mustang's forces the advantage over Central's troops, the Flame Alchemist unleashes the brutal power of burning hatred in the battle against the killer of Maes Hughes.

episodes.name: Beyond the Inferno
episodes.overview: As Envy writhes within the firestorm unleashed by Mustang's vengeful rage, Hawkeye must take drastic measures to prevent the Flame Alchemist's hatred from burning out of control.

episodes.name: The Adults' Way of Life
episodes.overview: A rebel victory is imminent and hope takes hold among Mustang and Armstrong's troops. Central's forces teeter on the brink of collapse - until their fallen leader returns to take control.

episodes.name: The Return of the Führer
episodes.overview: Central's forces fight with renewed vigor following Bradley's return, and the Fuhrer himself enters the battle. His first opponent is an armored tank. His second foe is even tougher.

episodes.name: Eternal Leave
episodes.overview: The battle for a nation's soul descends into chaos. Bradley unleashes death on those who dare engage him. Beneath Central, the one responsible for the Fuhrer's creation unleashes something far, far worse.

episodes.name: Sacrifices
episodes.overview: Mustang must make a difficult choice: will he break alchemy's greatest taboo? Or will he watch the person dearest to him die? Meanwhile, it grows ever more difficult to discern where Ling ends and Greed begins.

episodes.name: Lost Light
episodes.overview: As the light of the sun vanishes, Mustang learns the loss which comes from seeing the other side of the Gateway - and five sacrifices gather in the dark presence of the Father.

episodes.name: Eye of Heaven, Gateway of Earth
episodes.overview: The light is gone. Shadows swallow everything. As the planet quakes and the heavens tremble, the souls of heroes and villains alike vanish into darkness. The circle is complete.

episodes.name: He Who Would Swallow God
episodes.overview: Millions of lifeless bodies litter the landscape of Amestris, and a being with the power to create suns is unleashed upon the world. Unless Hohenheim has something amazing up his sleeve, all is surely lost.

episodes.name: A Fierce Counterattack
episodes.overview: A truly epic battle erupts when Edward, Mustang, Hawkeye, Greed, Izumi, and Armstrong attack the god-like Father. The odds are against the forces of good - until one brave boy makes a shocking sacrifice.

episodes.name: The Other Side of the Gateway
episodes.overview: When the battle ends, the one known as Father meets his final fate beyond the Gateway. When the one known as Fullmetal enters the sacred space, he finds only the promise of a new beginning.

episodes.name: Journey's End
episodes.overview: As one shared journey ends, many journeys begin. Those most touched by the conflict which surrounded the Philosopher's Stone now go their separate ways. One thing is certain: they will meet again.

name: Anne with an E
overview: A coming-of-age story about an outsider who, against all odds and numerous challenges, fights for love and acceptance and for her place in the world. The series centers on a young orphaned girl in the late 1890’s, who, after an abusive childhood spent in orphanages and the homes of strangers, is mistakenly sent to live with an elderly woman and her aging brother. Over time, 13-year-old Anne will transform their lives and eventually the small town in which they live with her unique spirit, fierce intellect and brilliant imagination.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A young orphan's arrival in Avonlea affects the hearts and minds of everyone she meets, beginning with the pair of aging siblings who take her in.

episodes.name: Your Will Shall Decide Your Destiny
episodes.overview: When a miscommunication brings a girl to Green Gables instead of a boy, Marilla and Matthew are faced with a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: I Am No Bird, and No Net Ensnares Me
episodes.overview: Hoping all is not lost, Matthew races to catch up with Anne while Marilla anxiously hopes and waits for their return to Green Gables.

episodes.name: But What Is So Headstrong as Youth?
episodes.overview: Anne is excited to begin school and make friends, but is unprepared for the bullying that occurs when she doesn’t fit in. Marilla accepts an invitation for a group.

episodes.name: An Inward Treasure Born
episodes.overview: Anne is faced with the decision of whether or not to return to school. A fire at the Gillis house and Anne’s generous actions help her in her choice.

episodes.name: Tightly Knotted to a Similar String
episodes.overview: Anne must deal with the inevitability of womanhood when she gets her first period. At the same time, Marilla and Matthew acclimatize to parenthood and revisit moments of their youth through Anne.

episodes.name: Remorse Is the Poison of Life
episodes.overview: When her little sister becomes ill, Diana runs to Anne for help. Meanwhile, the Blythe farm sees change, as Marilla is reminded of what she gave up and Matthew receives some unsettling news.

episodes.name: Wherever You Are Is My Home
episodes.overview: On the verge of losing the farm, the Cuthberts must do whatever it takes to save it. Anne is reminded of the strength of friendship and love. Season finale.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Anne's beloved world of Green Gables becomes a much bigger place, with new faces and heartfelt lessons about love, loss and growing up.

episodes.name: Youth is the Season of Hope
episodes.overview: The Cuthberts' boarders stir excitement with a question: Could there be gold in Avonlea? Elsewhere, Gilbert makes a new friend at sea.

episodes.name: Signs are Small Measurable Things, but Interpretations are Illimitable
episodes.overview: The steamer lands in Trinidad, bringing Bash face to face with his past. The Barrys get behind the gold rush, but Matthew and Marilla aren't so sure.

episodes.name: The True Seeing is Within
episodes.overview: An adventure away with the Barrys teaches Anne to trust her instincts. Marilla begins to suspect that her boarders aren’t as innocent as they seem.

episodes.name: The Painful Eagerness of Unfed Hope
episodes.overview: Anne writes letters as an "agent of romance" while Diana trains at home to be a lady. A life-changing encounter steers Gilbert toward his destiny.

episodes.name: The Determining Acts of Her Life
episodes.overview: A game of spin the bottle prompts burning questions about love and beauty. Anne and Cole bond over their differences as Gilbert makes his way home.

episodes.name: I Protest Against Any Absolute Conclusion
episodes.overview: Anne faces the world with a shocking new look while the town preps for its annual Christmas pantomime. Gilbert and Bash join the Cuthberts for dinner.

episodes.name: Memory Has as Many Moods as the Temper
episodes.overview: Cole accompanies the girls to Aunt Josephine's for a lavish party filled with surprises. Back at home, Marilla's health takes a worrisome turn.

episodes.name: Struggling Against the Perception of Facts
episodes.overview: With a wedding on the horizon, Anne wonders what kind of bride she'd like to be. Marilla sees an oculist, and Bash meets a friendly face in "The Bog."

episodes.name: What We Have Been Makes Us What We Are
episodes.overview: A brand-new teacher brings unconventional methods -- and a motorbike -- to Avonlea. Gilbert's plan to speed up his studies leaves Bash feeling lost.

episodes.name: The Growing Good of the World
episodes.overview: Anne rallies her friends to save Miss Stacy in the wake of a disastrous incident. Bash gets an unexpected gift, and Cole makes a surprising choice.

episodes.name: A Secret Which I Desired to Divine
episodes.overview: Anne's 16th birthday inspires her to learn more about her genealogy. Meanwhile, the school kids prepare for the Queen's entrance exams, leaving Diana isolated.

episodes.name: There is Something at Work in My Soul Which I Do Not Understand
episodes.overview: Anne's search takes her back to the orphanage, where she's forced to confront new realities while Elijah pays a visit to Avonlea.

episodes.name: What Can Stop the Determined Heart
episodes.overview: As Easter approaches, Mary's illness brings change to Avonlea. An Indian Affairs agent brings news that changes Ka'kwet's life.

episodes.name: A Hope of Meeting You in Another World
episodes.overview: Ka'kwet travels to school, while Anne embarks on the next phase of her quest. Diana pushes back against her parent's wishes resulting in an unforeseen adventure.

episodes.name: I Am Fearless and Therefore Powerful
episodes.overview: A dance rehearsal generates sparks -- and tension. A field trip to the woods opens new horizons for Gilbert. Bash seeks help from an unexpected source.

episodes.name: The Summit of My Desires
episodes.overview: Avonlea hosts the Island County Fair, which brings romance, heartbreak, competition, and disaster. Matthew goes head to head with an old friend, while Jerry seizes a unique opportunity and Anne seeks the advice of a fortune teller. The barn dance brings a devastating incident to light and compels Anne to take bold action.

episodes.name: A Strong Effort of the Spirit of Good
episodes.overview: Anne rallies the town to speak out against injustice. Josie makes a brave decision. A secret comes to light, causing a rift between Anne and Diana. Miss Stacy and the kids raise the ire of the School’s Board of Directors, to disastrous results.

episodes.name: Great and Sudden Change
episodes.overview: The students sit for the Queen's entrance exams. Ka’kwet hatches a plan. Aunt Josephine visits and brings a devious scheme. Gilbert is given an opportunity he never could have dreamed of. A new arrival in Avonlea tests Bash’s patience.

episodes.name: A Dense and Frightful Darkness
episodes.overview: After a shocking act of violence, Oqwatnuk and Aluk call upon the Cuthberts for help. Anne is forced to confront harsh truths. Gilbert makes a decision about his future.

episodes.name: The Better Feeling of My Heart
episodes.overview: As the students prepare to depart for Queen’s College, Gilbert takes a final chance. Marilla intervenes on Diana’s behalf. Anne embraces her future but finds that change also brings loss. Elijah returns to Avonlea. Anne has a fateful encounter in Charlottetown. Series finale.

name: Better Call Saul
overview: Six years before Saul Goodman meets Walter White. We meet him when the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer searching for his destiny, and, more immediately, hustling to make ends meet. Working alongside, and, often, against Jimmy, is “fixer” Mike Ehrmantraut. The series tracks Jimmy’s transformation into Saul Goodman, the man who puts “criminal” in “criminal lawyer".

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Jimmy McGill was a small-time lawyer, hustling to make ends meet. This is how the search for his destiny and the story of Saul Goodman collide.

episodes.name: Uno
episodes.overview: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

episodes.name: Mijo
episodes.overview: As his troubles escalate to a boiling point, Jimmy finds himself in dire straits. An act of carelessness puts Chuck at risk.

episodes.name: Nacho
episodes.overview: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.overview: Jimmy devises a bold plan to obtain new clients, but must face consequences when his relationships become strained.

episodes.name: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.overview: Alarming news disrupts Jimmy's efforts at drumming up new business, forcing him to make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Five-O
episodes.overview: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

episodes.name: Bingo
episodes.overview: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: RICO
episodes.overview: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

episodes.name: Pimento
episodes.overview: Chuck urges Jimmy to accept a harsh truth. Meanwhile, a deal threatens to go off the rails when Mike's ability to complete a job is called into question.

episodes.name: Marco
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of recent events, Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Jimmy McGill returns with a new outlook on life and growing appetites that will push his career -- and his relationships -- into uncharted territory.

episodes.name: Switch
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.name: Cobbler
episodes.overview: To keep a potentially messy situation from unraveling, Mike brokers a deal. Jimmy works to exonerate an eccentric client.

episodes.name: Amarillo
episodes.overview: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

episodes.name: Gloves Off
episodes.overview: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.name: Rebecca
episodes.overview: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.name: Bali Ha'i
episodes.overview: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. When he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.

episodes.name: Inflatable
