After Raizo, Kawamatsu, and Kikunojo reunite, they joined up with Luffy and Hyogoro in fighting the Beasts Pirates. However, the Beasts Pirates continue infecting prisoners with Excite Bullets.

episodes.name: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
episodes.overview: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!
episodes.overview: After Udon is conquered, Chopper tends to Luffy and works to develop a cure for his condition. Luffy asks Kid to join the fight against Kaido, but Kid rejects his offer and leaves Udon with Killer. After finding out that Luffy is a pirate, the prisoners distrust him, but Momonosuke speaks to them and convinces them to join the cause to liberate Wano Country. Elsewhere, Ashura Doji reveals to Kin'emon and Inuarashi that he had comrades who were too impatient to wait for the Kozuki Family to return and died when they tried to fight Kaido. Afterwards, Ashura comes around and decides to rejoin Kin'emon.

episodes.name: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
episodes.overview: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi’s ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.

episodes.name: Tension in Onigashima! Sudden Encounter ?! The Yonkous Duo.
episodes.overview:
As the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the Fire Festival, Zoro returns to Oihagi Bridge along with Hiyori and he challenges Gyukimaru again to reclaim Shusui. The battle is then interrupted by Kawamatsu.

Big Mom has been taken to Onigashima, where she and Kaido begin clashing.

episodes.name: Hiyori's Confession! Reunion at the Bridge of Thieves!
episodes.overview:
At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom continue with their clash. Queen contacts Udon, and Babanuki, having been tamed by Tama, gives Queen a false report.

Back at Udon, Hyogoro gets reacquainted with the other yakuza leaders, who join the rebellion.

At Oihagi Bridge, Hiyori and Kawamatsu have a heartfelt reunion. The reunion is cut short as a group of Beasts Pirates arrives, seeking revenge on Gyukimaru. Zoro and Kawamatsu defeat the attackers, and Gyukimaru flees the scene with Zoro chasing after him.

episodes.name: Your name is Enma! The Great Swords of Oden!
episodes.overview: After the reunion, Kawamatsu tells Hiyori about everything that happened to him since they separated.

episodes.name: A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Gathers
episodes.overview: At the secret place where Kawamatsu stored weapons, Zoro agrees to return Shusui in exchange for Enma. At the Flower Capital, Law subdues Hawkins and escapes prison with the help from an unknown individual. As the day of the Fire Festival draws closer, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the raid on Onigashima. Apoo returns to Wano with a group of gigantic beings known as the Numbers. At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom decide to put aside their feud and form an alliance to conquer the world.

episodes.name: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode
episodes.overview: Kin’emon, Momonosuke, and the others can’t fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma’s demonic power and its ties to him. And as the day of the Fire Festival is finally in sight, Kin’emon and the others head out for the rendezvous point.

episodes.name: Big News! The Warlords Attack Incident
episodes.overview: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.

episodes.name: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger
episodes.overview: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates that Kaido and Big Mom once belonged to along with all the other big names.

episodes.name: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!
episodes.overview: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place. Meanwhile, at Tokage Port, the rendezvous point for the rebel group, Kin’emon and the others are stunned by the fact that none of their allies are there.

episodes.name: The Best Samurai in Wano Country! Kozuki Oden Appears
episodes.overview: It is revealed that Orochi had the Beasts Pirates bombed the Thousand Sunny and destroyed some bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port. At the port, the Nine Red Scabbards prepare to continue with the raid on their own. A flashback to many years ago begins.

episodes.name: Tearful Apprentice - Oden and Kin'emon
episodes.overview: The Mountain God continues its rampage in the Flower Capital until Oden confronts and defeats it. After this incident, Oden was expelled from the capital. Due to their admiration for Oden, Kin'emon and Denjiro decide to follow him.

episodes.name: Changing Destiny - The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
episodes.overview: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others. Kin’emon and the other vassals are scolded by Yasuie when they try to steal money from him, and they begin reforming themselves for their lord Oden.

episodes.name: Oden's Determination! Whitebeard's Test!
episodes.overview: Kozuki Oden's dreams to leave Wano lead him directly to Whitebeard after he learns of the pirate's arrival. After a brief battle, Oden begs Whitebeard to let him join his crew. Whitebeard denies his request due to concerns about Oden's character.

episodes.name: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
episodes.overview: Toki tends to Oden after he rescued her from the kidnappers. On the next day, they are confronted by the kidnappers and their leader, Karma. Whitebeard intervenes and knocks out Karma. Whitebeard accepts Oden into his crew because of his selflessness.

episodes.name: Crossing Swords! Roger and Whitebeard!
episodes.overview: Orochi plots to take the shogunate with Higurashi's assistance. As Oden continues his journey with the Whitebeard Pirates, he finally encounters the Roger Pirates. A clash between Edward Newgate and Gol D. Roger ensues.

episodes.name: Roger's Wish! A New Journey!
episodes.overview: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been. Roger begs Whitebeard for permission to take Oden with him on a one-year journey. But Oden gives it some thought and speaks his mind as well!

episodes.name: The Bet of a Lifetime! Roger's Adventure!
episodes.overview: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom. Oden deciphers the Ponegliffs on those islands for Roger who believes those inscriptions will tell them the location of the last island on the Grand Line.

episodes.name: The Birth of the Pirate King - Arrival! The Last Island!
episodes.overview: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin’emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind. Then, after stopping by at the Mokomo Dukedom and getting a copy of the last Road Ponegliff, the Roger Pirates finally make it to the last island.

episodes.name: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
episodes.overview: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers. Later, he hears that Orochi took over the country with the help of a strong pirate named Kaido after the Shogun Sukiyaki’s death and becomes enraged by stories of his tyrannical acts.

episodes.name: Sad News! The Dawn Of The Great Pirate Era!
episodes.overview: Enraged by Orochi’s tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected. Meanwhile, the King of the Pirates Roger’s execution and last words are printed in newspapers and spread across the world.

episodes.name: Raid! Oden and the Nine Red Scabbards
episodes.overview: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano as well as his brutalities against the country’s mobster and Oden’s friend, Hyogoro and his wife. Despairing and in a rage, Oden finally decides to take down Orochi’s supporter, Kaido.

episodes.name: The Moment of Conclusion! Oden vs. Kaido!
episodes.overview: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido’s mansion. Even though Oden’s group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.

episodes.name: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!
episodes.overview: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head. Shinobu watches from among the spectators and reveals what Oden had been doing to save the country, to the surprise of the citizens.

episodes.name: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!
episodes.overview: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano. Time ticks down for Oden and his clan’s freedom.

episodes.name: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
episodes.overview: As Kin’emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden’s family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children. Leaving Momonosuke to Kin’emon and Hiyori to Kawamatsu, Toki appears in front of the desperate people of the Land of Wano and gives a prophecy.

episodes.name: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
episodes.overview: After 20 years since Oden Castle burned down, Oden’s surviving retainers are working hard separately at their own missions, believing in Toki’s prophecy. The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!

episodes.name: Pirates at Sea! Raid! Onward to Onigashima
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin’emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat. Kaido’s army that appears out of nowhere and a betrayal drive the Akazaya members into a corner.

episodes.name: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido’s army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills. When it seems like they gain upper hand in the battle, another strong enemy appears to help Kaido’s army.

episodes.name: Good Luck!? Leader Kin'emon's Plot
episodes.overview: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin’emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido’s army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.

episodes.name: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
episodes.overview: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido’s army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon. However, a surprising figure comes to help the cornered Straw Hats.

episodes.name: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!
episodes.overview: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido. As the Straw Hats approach the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima, they are attacked out of the blue.

episodes.name: Kaido's Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
episodes.overview: To Law and the others’ surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido’s formidable subordinates, the Tobi Roppo, are called in.

episodes.name: The Samurai Warriors' Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.

episodes.name: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet
episodes.overview: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido’s banquet. Meanwhile, Kanjuro loses his way to Kaido in underground passages with Momonosuke who he kidnapped in tow.

episodes.name: Thinking of Otama! Luffy's Furious Strike!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido’s subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.

episodes.name: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!
episodes.overview: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces to his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo. Scratchmen Apoo stands in Luffy and Zoro’s way and with his ability to use music as a weapon, he launches unpredictable attacks which corner Luffy and Zoro.

episodes.name: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!
episodes.overview: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense. Meanwhile, Kin’emon changes his strategy and his group tries to infiltrate the castle from its side, but there is an unexpected change of the floor plan which coincidentally makes Sanji excited.

episodes.name: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido’s castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom’s children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima again, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!

episodes.name: Oath of Man! Fierce Battle of the Brachio-Tank!
episodes.overview: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back! Meanwhile, Kanjuro takes the battered and bruised Momonosuke to Kaido and Orochi, then breaks the news to them about Oden’s retainers who were thought to be dead.

episodes.name: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido's Son!
episodes.overview: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts. When Luffy is driven into a corner, someone wearing a demon mask appears and whisks him away.

episodes.name: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
episodes.overview: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido’s son Yamato’s motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy’s punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.

episodes.name: Desire to be Oden! Yamato's Dream!
episodes.overview: The Akazaya members who were on board Law’s Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn’t expect. Kaido’s son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what’s behind his mask!

episodes.name: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
episodes.overview: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they’re blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro. Meanwhile, as Kaido’s son Yamato shows Luffy the handcuffs that have restricted his freedom for years, they hear Kaido making a speech on his grand plan.

episodes.name: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!
episodes.overview: Kaido’s plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.

episodes.name: Raid! Inheriting Oden's Will!
episodes.overview: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.

episodes.name: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy's All-Out War Begins!
episodes.overview: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!

episodes.name: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
episodes.overview: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon. However, the Akazaya members have secret weapons to use against him

episodes.name: The Rebellion of Zeus?! Nami's Desperate Situation!
episodes.overview: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom

episodes.name: The Fate That Protects You! Yamato and Momonosuke!
episodes.overview: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato, the self-proclaimed Oden, finally meets his son Momonosuke.

episodes.name: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hat Pirates Gather!
episodes.overview: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin’emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks! Meanwhile, Luffy and Zoro try to get to the rooftop to help Kin’emon and the others, but Queen and King get in their way.

episodes.name: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
episodes.overview: Who’s-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.

episodes.name: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
episodes.overview: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp’s practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.

episodes.name: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
episodes.overview: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.

episodes.name: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden’s Secret Swordplay!
episodes.overview: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido. Hearing Kaido jeering at them for being weak, the samurai retainers attack him relentlessly, remembering the day Oden told them to master his sword skill.

episodes.name: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
episodes.overview: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake. Meanwhile, Luffy and Sanji, who are on their way to the rooftop, run into another Headliner with a special ability.

episodes.name: I Won't Forgive Him! Chopper's Determination!
episodes.overview: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Meanwhile, seeing people suffering from Queen’s Plague Rounds, Chopper is determined to save everyone.

episodes.name: Zoro's Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag!
episodes.overview: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.

episodes.name: Nami Surrenders?! Ulti's Fierce Headbutt!
episodes.overview: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy’s declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.

episodes.name: Sasaki’s Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
episodes.overview: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.

episodes.name: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper's Fire Trick!
episodes.overview: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus. In the castle, Luffy, Jimbei, and Sanji are climbing up the stairs to reach the rooftop where the Akazaya members’ tough battle against Kaido rages on.

episodes.name: It's Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!
episodes.overview: Sanji hears a woman’s scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it’s a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.

episodes.name: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
episodes.overview: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.

episodes.name: Yamato's Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
episodes.overview: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido’s head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.

episodes.name: Marco's Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episodes.overview: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro’s way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro’s determination and tries to pave the way for him.

episodes.name: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
episodes.overview: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he’s ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls “heaven.”

episodes.name: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.

episodes.name: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!
episodes.overview: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.

episodes.name: Otama's Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
episodes.overview: After watching the Straw Hats’ departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she’s here on Onigashima, it’s time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!

episodes.name: Sanji's Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!
episodes.overview: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.

episodes.name: Spank Strikes! Sanji's Woman-trouble!
episodes.overview: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.

episodes.name: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
episodes.overview: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.

episodes.name: Preparations OK! Chopperphage Nebulizer!
episodes.overview: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn’t just them who were devastated by Queen’s raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.

episodes.name: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Red Scabbards!
episodes.overview: That unparalleled laugh! The Akazaya regain hope upon witnessing Oden's return. They failed in their attempt to take down Kaido, but after twenty years, they team up with Oden again to finish the job!

episodes.name: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors' Deadly Attack!
episodes.overview: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him. Meanwhile, on the rooftop, Kaido and Big Mom unleashes a combination attack on Luffy and the others.

episodes.name: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
episodes.overview: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.

episodes.name: Protect Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique
episodes.overview: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.

episodes.name: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
episodes.overview: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.

episodes.name: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta!
episodes.overview: A young Luffy who has been dreaming about getting out of Windmill Village one day to accomplish something great meets a young girl named Uta who came along with Shanks and the Red-Hair Pirates calling herself the musician of the pirate group.

episodes.name: A Pledge for the New Genesis! Luffy and Uta!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Uta run across Windmill Village, compete with each other, and share their dreams with each other. They also pledge to build a new genesis for everyone to live happily. However, one day, the unexpected happens.

episodes.name: Nami Screams! A Deadly Death Race!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Kaido who have both infused themselves with the Color of the Supreme King clash! Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and Tama are running from Page One to get to the Performance Floor, but they bump into another tough enemy, Big Mom.

episodes.name: The Dawn of the Land of Wano! The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
episodes.overview: Kin’emon and the Akazaya members are rushing to help Momonosuke and everyone else while Yamato leaves Momonosuke and Shinobu in a hide-out to lure away their enemies. At the same time, Ulti tries to avenge her brother against Big Mom.

episodes.name: The Conclusion! Luffy, Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King!
episodes.overview: Sanji is forced to run with Zoro on his shoulder. Meanwhile, Nami bravely stands up against Ulti and Big Mom. On the rooftop, the intense battle between Luffy and Kaido finally comes to an end.

episodes.name: Luffy, Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
episodes.overview: Luffy is pushed off the rooftop by Kaido. Meanwhile, Zeus intervenes in a fight between Big Mom and Nami’s group and stands up for the one who he wants to save. On the Performance Floor, Chopper is in a fierce battle against Queen.

episodes.name: The Beasts Trampled! The End of the Kozuki Family!
episodes.overview: While the Straw Hats and their allies are all having a hard time, they are shocked by the news that Luffy lost to Kaido. At the same time, Kanjuro closes in on Momonosuke to destroy the Kozuki lineage.

episodes.name: Fight Against the Dark Night! The Commander-in-Chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off!
episodes.overview: Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy’s loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin’emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!

episodes.name: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
episodes.overview: Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaido while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Performance Floor along with Usopp and Tama, hears a strange voice.

episodes.name: Nami’s Lethal Attack! Otama’s Desperate Challenge!
episodes.overview: Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Performance Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters shows up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Otama stands up to give a command!

episodes.name: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
episodes.overview: Hearing Otama’s command, the Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobi Roppo and others! Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jimbei gets stunned by Who’s-Who’s story.

episodes.name: The Pride of a Helmsman? The Enraged Jimbei!
episodes.overview: Who’s-Who expresses fierce resentment toward Luffy and Jimbei fights back out of his loyalty to Luffy. As Who’s-Who asks Jimbei a question, he tramples on the dignity of the Fish-Men and that sparks Jimbei’s outrage.

episodes.name: Showdown Battles of the Monsters! Yamato and Franky!
episodes.overview: To cut ties with Kaido, Yamato unleashes his true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Man-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.

episodes.name: The Predator’s Trap! Black Maria’s Temptation!
episodes.overview: Kaido tries to convince Yamato to become the Shogun of the Land of Wano and rule the country with the special power he obtained by accident. Meanwhile, Saul, Professor Clover, and Robin’s mother Olvia suddenly appear in front of her.

episodes.name: Slash the Nightmare - Brook Draws His Freezing Sword!
episodes.overview: In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon. They reminisce about the old days and play music together, however, they suddenly attack Brook.

episodes.name: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!
episodes.overview: Black Maria torments Robin both physically and spiritually. As she burns in hellfire, Robin remembers the people who gave her a hard time and the people who supported her, and she as Demon Child shows what she is really capable of.

episodes.name: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
episodes.overview: Killer is shocked to find out who Hawkins’ straw doll he slashed represents. Meanwhile, Sanji who is in a hard battle against Queen and King sees enemy brutes going after the injured Zoro, and no one else is there to save him.

episodes.name: Taking a Chance! The Two Arms Go into Battle!
episodes.overview: Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyogoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.

episodes.name: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
episodes.overview: Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.

episodes.name: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge
episodes.overview: The battle between Kaidou and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.

episodes.name: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the Beasts
episodes.overview: Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaido, vows to survive until Luffy returns.

episodes.name: Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke's Determination!
episodes.overview: Momonosuke faces Kaido once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaido.

episodes.name: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky!
episodes.overview: Yamato helps Momonosuke conquer his fear of flying and the two take on the most important task of saving Onigashima. Meanwhile, Luffy and Kaidou clash which parts the heavens. The clear skies help Inuarashi and Nekomamushi finally defeat their foes.

episodes.name: The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
episodes.overview: Realizing Onigashima’s impending threat, imperiling everyone’s life, Yamato and Momonosuke launch a secret operation. Meanwhile, Sanji and Zoro are both in a deadly battle against Queen and King.

episodes.name: Sanji's Mutation - The Two Arms in Crisis!
episodes.overview: Queen’s unforeseen move stuns everyone on the Performance Floor. And then, he goes on to utilize another special technique which can break every bone in Sanji’s body. On the verge of a crisis, Sanji feels something strange again.

episodes.name: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
episodes.overview: Killer tries to figure out how to fight against Hawkins whose power enables him to transfer damage against him to Kid. Kid is dying not knowing where his damage is coming from. Killer takes a chance with Kid’s life on the line.

episodes.name: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames
episodes.overview: Sanji still wonders what is happening to his body as he receives attacks. Meanwhile, the dying Kin’emon hears an unexpected voice calling for the also dying Kanjuro. Through the Smail, the voice of Orochi tries to stir up Kanjuro to make him perform one last time.

episodes.name: Strike Back! Law and Kid's Counterattack Alliance
episodes.overview: Law and Kid are having a tough battle against a formidable Emperor of the Sea, Big Mom. However, when they decide to work collaboratively and use their awakened Devil Fruit powers, they see the possibility of taking down the old generation.

episodes.name: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
episodes.overview: Sanji is tormented by the idea of becoming a cruel Germa warrior like his siblings and torn between being strong or being humane as he is now. When he makes up his mind, he asks Zoro the ultimate favor.

episodes.name: The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi's Evil Clutches Close in
episodes.overview: The chaos within the floating island of Onigashima rages on to seemingly no end. Kazenbo, Kajuro's creation, is wreaking havoc all throughout the Skull Dome in the name of vengence for the Kurozami. The rampage causes panic among Beasts Pirates and samurai, alike. As Orochi watches on, he hears a sound that reminds him of his past love.

episodes.name: Zoro's Hardship - A Monster! King the Wildfire
episodes.overview: Zoro is facing a hard fight against King who seems invincible. Even one of Zoro’s deadliest attacks doesn’t leave a scratch on him. On top of that, one of Zoro’s swords goes out of control and gets in his way.

episodes.name: Secrets of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
episodes.overview: Zoro still can’t gain control of Enma which keeps extracting his Haki. Backed into a corner by the formidable King, Zoro remembers the encounter with an old man in his hometown when he was a child.

episodes.name: The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
episodes.overview: Queen’s formidable attacks remind Sanji of his family. Annoyed by Queen’s provocations, Sanji remembers a young woman mysteriously getting hurt in front of him and realizes what happened at that time, which lights a fire within him.

episodes.name: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
episodes.overview: Zoro tries to figure out a way to damage King. Meanwhile, King remembers when he first met his captain Kaido and declares that his captain is the one to become the King of the Pirates, which leads Zoro to set his swords alight with hellfire.

episodes.name: Luffy is on the Move! A Turning Point of a New Era!
episodes.overview: Usopp finds Kin’emon’s upper body and the heavily wounded Kiku. However, they are surrounded by the Gifters and can’t find a way out. Seeing the samurai giving up hope, Usopp remembers his determination.

episodes.name: Drunken Dragon Bagua! The Lawless Dragon Closing in on Luffy
episodes.overview: In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is about to end. On Onigashima, the battle between Luffy and Kaido is getting even more intense. However, Kaido who is excited about having a strong opponent starts drinking too much.

episodes.name: The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire up, the Will of the New Generation!
episodes.overview: With the ongoing battles in various parts of Onigashima, everyone is reaching their limits. In the face of Big Mom, Law and Kid are exhausted and deeply wounded. Mocking them, Big Mom tries to head for the rooftop.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism!
episodes.overview: Big Mom’s strong life force discourages Law and Kid. Law tells Kid that he only has enough energy for one last strike. However, a monster Big Mom summons puts the two in even more of a bind.

episodes.name: To the New Era! Settled! The Determination of the Brats
episodes.overview: Kid’s all-out deadly attack and Law’s tactical action leave Big Mom in the lurch. Then she remembers what Roger said in the past and wonders if the treasure he mentioned is out there after all.

episodes.name: Moon Princess Echoes! The Final Phase of the Land of Wano!
episodes.overview: Kaido mourns Big Mom’s defeat and remembers the day he met her for the first time. Meanwhile, backed into a corner, Orochi sees the true nature of Komurasaki, the woman he loves, and trembles with fear.

episodes.name: There is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
episodes.overview: On orders from the Five Elders, the CP-0 agent Guernica tries to get to Luffy, but Drake stands in his way. Meanwhile, Luffy who only has very little energy left uses his last Gear Four to emancipate the people of the Land of Wano from Kaido.

episodes.name: Luffy Is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
episodes.overview: The battle between Luffy and Kaido comes to an unexpected end. Kaido comes down and tells everyone that Luffy has been defeated and the Land of Wano is finished. Momonosuke and Yamato argue over whether they should still continue fighting.

episodes.name: Luffy's Peak - Attained! Gear Five
episodes.overview: As Luffy's heart pounds in a funny way, the Five Elders reveal the secret behind the Gum-Gum Fruit. Meanwhile, Orochi tries to convince Komurasaki to escape with him, but when he sees Kanjuro, he makes a malicious decision.

episodes.name: The Ridiculous Power! Gear Five in Full Play
episodes.overview: Bouncing on the ground and becoming a giant, Luffy enjoys his new, bizarre power while Kaido is bewildered and can’t make sense of it. Meanwhile, Kid, Law, and Luffy’s other allies continue the fight down below against flames and enemies alike, waiting for Luffy to emerge victorious.

episodes.name: No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
episodes.overview: As Luffy and Kaidou continue their battle, Raizo and Jinbe utilize their plan to put out the fire that has spread throughout Onigashima. Meanwhile, Yamato warns Momonosuke of the danger Onigashima will face if he does not act soon to create new flame clouds to keep it from crashing into the Flower Capital.

episodes.name: I Trust Momo - Luffy's Final Powerful Technique!
episodes.overview: Momonosuke struggles to create Flame Clouds to sustain Onigashima which is in free fall. In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is ending with people flying their Sky Boats in the air. To fulfill the promise to free the Land of Wano, Luffy inflates his fist to strike Kaido.

episodes.name: 20 Years' Worth of Prayers! Take Back the Land of Wano!
episodes.overview: When Oden died 20 years ago, Orochi took over the Land of Wano. People were separated from their loved ones, forced into labor, and starved. Now they pray that Kaido will vanish as Luffy’s battle against him reaches a climax.

episodes.name: The World That Luffy Wants!
episodes.overview: Kaido remembers how he was treated unfairly in the past and how he believes the world should be. While his friends struggle to survive on Onigashima, Luffy is asked by Kaido to picture his ideal world as he throws a destructive punch.

episodes.name: The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
episodes.overview: The samurai and the Straw Hats shout for joy as they hear that Luffy defeated Kaido. Meanwhile, Momonosuke informs Zunesha of a major decision that he made. However, when Yamato calls on the Animal Kingdom Pirates to stop fighting, the earth trembles.

episodes.name: He Returns! The Shogun of the Land of Wano, Kozuki Momonosuke
episodes.overview: The people of the Flower Capital get flustered when Kin’emon and the other Akazaya samurai who were supposed to be dead appear from the smoke. However, the last one who walks out of the smoke, and what he says, confuses the people even more.

episodes.name: The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
episodes.overview: The Land of Wano is in a celebratory mood now that the years of tyranny are over. However, Yamato is holding back his hunger alone until Hiyori arrives with the news he was waiting for. Meanwhile, some unknown figure approaches the Land of Wano.  Momonosuke announces to the citizens his victory and the return of the Kozuki Family. Tama remembers her childhood, and Yamato asks to join Luffy's crew.

episodes.name: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea!
episodes.overview: The news of the defeat of the Emperors of the Sea spreads across the world. Luffy enjoys the banquet but just as he is about to make a toast, an enraged Kid comes in to strike him. The reason behind his action surprises Luffy

episodes.name: The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!
episodes.overview: As the Navy Admiral Ryokugyu comes to strike the Flower Capital, the Akazaya samurai notice and try to stop him, but his Woods-Woods Fruit power overwhelms them. Meanwhile, another formidable, yet friendly, guest approaches the Land of Wano

episodes.name: The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired's Imperial Rage
episodes.overview: Navy Admiral Ryokugyu keeps up a savage assault against the Akazaya samurai who are still recovering from the last battle. Momonosuke tries to defend the Land of Wano with all his might, but he gets driven into a corner.

episodes.name: The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
episodes.overview: Momonosuke and Hiyori are happy to see their grandfather who was supposed to be dead and the Straw Hats are surprised when Robin tells them about Pluton the Ancient Weapon. Meanwhile, Momonosuke is kept busy in his role as the new Shogun.

episodes.name: Time to Depart - The Land of Wano and the Straw Hats
episodes.overview: An untold story from before the Straw Hats’ departure. Luffy visits the ruins of Oden Castle where Oden’s grave once was and Zoro visits Yasuie’s grave where he meets Hiyori. Later, Luffy and Tama eat red-bean soup together for the last time and share their feelings with each other.

episodes.name: The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke's Vow
episodes.overview: Angered by Luffy's attempt to leave without saying goodbye, Momonosuke rushes with Kin’emon and Yamato to the port from where the Straw Hats are about to leave, thinking back on his days with Luffy.

episodes.name: A New Emperor! Buggy the Genius Jester!
episodes.overview: Luffy and the other Straw Hats’ new bounties are revealed. Meanwhile, at Emptee Bluffs Island,　Crocodile and the greatest swordsman in the world Mihawk, visit Buggy to discuss their newly-established organization, Cross Guild.

episodes.name: The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
episodes.overview: Navy Captain Koby comes to the Island of Women to arrest Pirate Empress Hancock with the new Pacifistas. While the Navy and Kuja fighters clash, Blackbeard comes to raid, also targeting Hancock.

episodes.name: Luffy's Dream
episodes.overview: The three-way struggle between the Navy, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy’s words surprise everyone.

seasons.name: Egghead
seasons.overview: The aftermaths of both the Levely and the Raid on Onigashima, as well as the erasure of the Lulusia Kingdom, cause major shifts across the world that could lead to global war. The Straw Hat Pirates, following their Log Pose, arrive at the mysterious, futuristic island Egghead where the super genius Dr. Vegapunk resides. However, after being tipped off about Vegapunk's research into the Void Century, the World Government decides to dispatch a CP0 team to assassinate Vegapunk. Betrayal and intrigue on all sides leads to a Marine siege on the island that will escalate into an incident that will shock the world.

episodes.name: Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!
episodes.overview: Sabo, the Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army, contacts Koala and everyone in Kamabakka Queendom. He explains to them about the things that he is accused of, but someone who was eavesdropping on the call takes a stunning action.

episodes.name: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
episodes.overview: Luffy and Chopper fall into the rough cold sea along with the mysterious girl. Jimbei tries to help them but another attack comes from the unknown creature. Meanwhile, the Sunny is hit by torpedoes and the rest of the Straw Hats are thrown into the sea, too.

episodes.name: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
episodes.overview: A young girl who came out of the big robot names herself Dr. Vegapunk and it surprises Franky and the rest of the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Luffy’s group gets to the surface of the island where futuristic buildings stand and unknown giant creatures wander about.

episodes.name: Bonney's Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
episodes.overview: While Luffy and the others are enjoying the futuristic machines of Egghead, someone who resembles Bartholomew Kuma comes after them. When Luffy tries to fight back, Bonney stops him and reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.

episodes.name: The Winner Takes All! Law vs. Blackbeard!
episodes.overview: The Blackbeard Pirates ambushed the Heart Pirates led by Law. The Blackbeard Pirates’ top officers use a variety of formidable Devil Fruit powers and keep pushing the Heart Pirates in order to obtain the copies of the Road Ponegliffs.

episodes.name: The Mystery Deepens! Egghead Labophase
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats without Luffy, Chopper, and Jimbei are taken to the laboratory on the clouds far above the ground by Lilith. They get excited about the things they've never seen before. However, inside the laboratory, a new threat is waiting for them.

episodes.name: The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!
episodes.overview: Nami and the others are attacked by a Pacifista who resembles Jimbei and while they’re in battle, some of Vegapunk’s Satellites look on with excitement. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others find something extraordinary at the scrap heap.

episodes.name: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
episodes.overview: Vegapunk Shaka shares with Robin and the others his theory about an ancient kingdom and the 100-Year Void. He even says that he visited Ohara after its destruction. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper try to activate the giant robot and something surprising happens.

episodes.name: The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
episodes.overview: Shaka reveals the secret behind the foundation of the Revolutionary Army and how the relationship between Vegapunk and Dragon affected it. Meanwhile, Vegapunk explains to Luffy and the others about his special power and how his clones work.

episodes.name: The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
episodes.overview: Vegapunk reveals the shocking history of the ancient giant robot and asks Luffy to take him off Egghead. Rob Lucci and his fellow Cipher Pol agents arrive at the island and ask for permission to enter the port.

episodes.name: Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
episodes.overview: CP-0 led by Rob Lucci makes a forced landing at Egghead and people on the Fabriophase are plunged into confusion while Shaka and the others prepare to fight back on the Labophase. The enraged Atlas stands up to defend the peace of the island.

episodes.name: Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!
episodes.overview: Luffy transforms into the Warrior of Liberation as Rob Lucci also shows his awakened Devil Fruit form. As the two clash, Vegapunk reveals the shocking truth of the Gum-Gum Fruit and his eye-opening theory on Devil Fruits.

episodes.name: The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim's Powers!
episodes.overview: Vegapunk describes how he managed to grant the Seraphim Devil Fruit powers, which surprises Franky and the others. Meanwhile, Luffy is still facing Lucci in his savage, awakened form, but the rocket to the Labophase is about to leave.

episodes.name: Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
episodes.overview: Vegapunk asks the Straw Hats to take him on board their ship which makes Franky and Usopp happy but annoys Nami. Lucci orders his troops to block off all Vegapunk’s escape routes and looks to invade the heavily-secured Labophase.

episodes.name: Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!
episodes.overview: CP-0 enters the Labophase and starts attacking the Thousand Sunny as soon as they find it. Luffy reunites with Nami and the others but finds out that Vegapunk is missing. Meanwhile, Bonney is pressing Vegapunk to change back her father Kuma.

episodes.name: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim's All-out Attack!
episodes.overview: The Seraphim come following CP-0 to the Labophase, pitting Zoro and Brook against the seven of them. Sanji, Franky, Edison, and Lilith leave the lab to fight them, but the Seraphim launch a full-scale attack on the lab.

episodes.name: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy
episodes.overview: Stussy suddenly knocked out Lucci to the Straw Hats’ surprise, and when Shaka reveals her true identity, they’re stunned again. Meanwhile, a major incident occurs on an island called Sphinx where Whitebeard came from.

episodes.name: Trouble Occurs! Seek Dr. Vegapunk!
episodes.overview: CP-0 takes control of the Fabriophase but gets attacked by an unknown force. Meanwhile, in the Labophase, the Straw Hats and Dr. Vegapunk’s Satellites find out that Vegapunk has disappeared and begin searching for him.

episodes.name: A Shudder! The Evil Hand Creeping Up on the Laboratory
episodes.overview: Bonney witnesses her father Bartholomew Kuma’s painful memories. Meanwhile at the lab, Shaka notices that their communications and surveillance cameras are being cut off by somebody.

episodes.name: Incomprehensible! The Seraphim's Rebellion!
episodes.overview: The Seraphim suddenly start attacking the Straw Hats and the Vegapunk Satellites. They are not stopping even when the Satellites order them to. When Luffy and Zoro are cornered, Lucci and Kaku wake up and make them a surprising offer.

episodes.name: A Tough Decision! An Unusual United Front!
episodes.overview: Lucci and Kaku from CP-0, who came to Egghead with a mission to eliminate the seven Vegapunks, ask Luffy and Zoro to uncuff them so they can fight alongside them against the Seraphim, but Luffy and Zoro are reluctant to do so.

episodes.name: Survive! Deadly Combat with the Strongest Form of Humanity!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats and CP-0 relentlessly attack the Seraphim, but the Seraphim keep getting back up. Then, Zoro notices that the Seraphim remind him of someone who he fought before. Meanwhile, Shaka goes to check one place where he thinks Vegapunk Stella might be.

episodes.name: The Second Ohara! The Mastermind's Ambition!
episodes.overview: Stussy and Sentomaru discuss how big the threat that closes in on Egghead is as Luffy and the others keep fighting the uncontrollable Seraphim. Meanwhile, in an underground lab, someone approaches Vegapunk, who is being held captive.

episodes.name: Clash! Shanks vs. Eustass Kid
episodes.overview: Kid gives his crew a pep talk before the battle with Shanks. And Shanks also prepares for the battle but learns how his own subordinates do as they like to protect their beloved boss. Finally, Kid has his Damned Punk ready to shoot.

episodes.name: Run, Koby! A Desperate Escape Strategy!
Episode 1114
Episode 1115

name: Alchemy of Souls
overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Alchemy of Souls
seasons.overview: Set in a fictional country called Daeho that does not exist in history or on maps, it is about the love and growth of young mages as they overcome their twisted fates due to a forbidden magic spell known as the "alchemy of souls", which allows souls to switch bodies. It follows the story of an elite assassin named Naksu, whose soul is accidentally trapped inside the weak body of Mudeok — Jang Uk's servant from a powerful and noble mage family in the country. The young master of the Jang family, Jang Uk, holds a dark secret about his scandalous birth. He wants the formidable assassin to help change his destiny.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Naksu casts one last spell to save her soul. Jang Uk looks for the only sorcerer who would dare to help him. Mudeok gets taken under a new master.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Mudeok refuses Uk's proposal to form an alliance, he convinces her in other ways. Park Jin barricades Songrim to catch a spy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Mudeok sets the terms before beginning proper training. Uk discovers that Heo Yeom left him with a gift he must learn to claim as his own.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Uk suffers a fever and chills, much to Mudeok's delight. Prince Go Won visits the Jang household, demanding a family heirloom and a show of respect.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Mudeok and Uk arrive at a secluded, empty cabin. Jin Mu orders a body dump. Jin Hogyeong offers protection for Uk... at a cost.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Seo Yul and Park Danggu visit Uk at his training ground. Mudeok pushes her student to the extreme. Jin Choyeon prepares a wedding gift.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Won encounters an illusion. Uk demands entry into Jinyowon. Gil Ju goes after Naksu to acquire a body.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ju stumbles into town to satisfy his hunger. Uk follows closely behind him. Rumors surface of Naksu’s comeback.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Hogyeong looks for her long-lost child. Mu devises a plan to help end that search. Uk and Mudeok are driven apart.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Uk is given a book to read. Yul saves a girl at the market. Mudeok goes through an intensive selection process to become a servant at Songrim.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Uk loses the will to train. Mudeok makes a bet with Prince Won. At Cheonbugwan, a line of blind girls await judgment.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: An unusual death draws Jin’s attention. Uk learns of Naksu’s tragic past. Kim Doju sends Mudeok on an errand to Cheonbugwan.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A sudden lightning strike causes damage to Cheonbugwan. Jin and Mu dispute who's to blame. Hemp Master Lee Cheol takes Uk on a special fishing trip.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Uk faces his tenth and final opponent with a trick or two up his sleeve. Yul keeps Mudeok close. Jin Wutak plays a trick on his daughter.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Mudeok is caught at the site of a bloody murder. Master Lee presents the royal family with a gift and a prophecy. Soi tracks down a blind friend.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Jin and Hogyeong get into a heated dispute as they both lay claim to an artifact. Uk runs into Prince Won while on the search for a shaman.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Mudeok investigates Jin Buyeon’s true identity. Mu convinces Hogyeong to make a special announcement at an important assembly.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Trapped inside an enchanted force field, Mudeok explores her newfound powers but soon learns of its drawbacks. Soi makes a deal with a soul shifter.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Uk comes up with a solution to break the force field that would require him to risk it all. Danggu and Choyeon make a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Love is in the air with a wedding on the way and Uk playing matchmaker. Mu appoints an assassin to do his dirty work and become his scapegoat.

seasons.name: Alchemy of Souls: Light & Shadow
seasons.overview: Jang Uk, now a fierce but troubled hunter of the soul shifters, meets an imprisoned young woman who seeks his help to reclaim her freedom.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A search leads Uk into Jinyowon, where he runs into a mysterious woman who is planning an escape. Meanwhile, haunting visions of the dead trouble him.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong makes a family secret public. Jin Bu-yeon finds new shelter but realizes that her freedom is limited and time is running out.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A debate surrounding a secret wedding ends with a shocking announcement. Jin Ho-gyeong tries to summon Bu-yeon back by causing her excruciating pain.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Flashes of another's memory leads Bu-yeon to find out more about Uk's past heartbreak. News of a feared assassin's return shakes the whole kingdom.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yul uncovers the mystery of his ill health as So-i becomes desperate to save him. Uk and Bu-yeon continue to hit barriers in their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: While Yul bears the burden of a heavy secret, Uk investigates a conspiracy involving a mysterious animal that could cause a devastating drought.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: To save a fatally injured mage, Uk gives Jin Mu a firm warning and asks Jin Ho-gyeong for help, who agrees to cooperate under one condition.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Go Won presents Uk with a choice. Jin Mu sets the next step of his plan in motion. Heo Yun-ok requests to meet Bu-yeon in private.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As the search for the ice stone continues, Uk reaffirms his alliances while Jin Mu prepares for battle with an army of loyal soul shifters.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong takes a risk to protect Jinyowon and its treasures from attack. Having had a glimpse into the future, Uk braces for the inevitable.

name: The Owl House
overview: An animated fantasy-comedy series that follows Luz, a self-assured teenage girl who accidentally stumbles upon a portal to a magical world where she befriends a rebellious witch, Eda, and an adorably tiny warrior, King. Despite not having magical abilities, Luz pursues her dream of becoming a witch by serving as Eda's apprentice at the Owl House and ultimately finds a new family in an unlikely setting.

episodes.name: A Lying Witch and a Warden
episodes.overview: Luz, a self-assured teenage girl, accidentally stumbles upon a portal to a magical world where she befriends a rebellious witch, Eda, and an adorably tiny warrior, King. In order to get home, Luz must help them with a mission.

episodes.name: Witches Before Wizards
episodes.overview: When an ancient wizard gives Luz a map for a mystical quest, she wonders if she is actually a Chosen One.

episodes.name: I Was a Teenage Abomination
episodes.overview: Luz sneaks into the local magic school to help a friend and makes a new enemy in the process.

episodes.name: The Intruder
episodes.overview: Luz and King have to defend the Owl House from a mysterious intruder.

episodes.name: Covention
episodes.overview: Luz's lesson about witch covens goes awry when she finds herself thrust into a witch's duel.

episodes.name: Hooty's Moving Hassle
episodes.overview: When Luz, Willow and Gus accidentally animate the Owl House, the house runs amok around Bonesborough.

episodes.name: Lost in Language
episodes.overview: While checking out the library, Luz's pranks lead to unintended consequences.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Swap
episodes.overview: A simple disagreement leads to a complex situation when Eda, King, and Luz triple-down on a wager.

episodes.name: Something Ventured, Someone Framed
episodes.overview: When Gus sneaks Luz into Hexside School to present at the Human Appreciation Society, Luz sees a side of the school she didn't expect.

episodes.name: Escape of the Palisman
episodes.overview: When an adventure with Eda's staff goes awry, Luz and her friends have to earn the staff back from a mysterious forest creature, or lose the staff forever.

episodes.name: Sense and Insensitivity
episodes.overview: When King becomes a bestselling author, he learns a valuable lesson in reading the fine print.

episodes.name: Adventures in the Elements
episodes.overview: Luz needs to learn a new spell, so Eda takes her to the most magical place on the island to train.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.overview: During Luz’s first day of Magic School, curiosity gets the best of her, and she finds herself thrown into the Delinquent Track, where she’s not allowed to learn magic.

episodes.name: Really Small Problems
episodes.overview: King confides in a carnival fortuneteller who makes his dream come true, but it comes at a cost.

episodes.name: Understanding Willow
episodes.overview: Luz, Willow and Amity take a trip down memory lane.

episodes.name: Enchanting Grom Fright
episodes.overview: Luz experiences Grom, Hexside’s version of Prom, and it’s not what she expects.

episodes.name: Wing It Like Witches
episodes.overview: Not your average underdog story.

episodes.name: Agony of a Witch
episodes.overview: On a school field trip to the mysterious Emperor’s Castle, Luz strays from the group and into danger.

episodes.name: Young Blood, Old Souls
episodes.overview: Luz’s skills as a witch are put to the test when she attempts the impossible.

episodes.name: Separate Tides
episodes.overview: Luz feels guilty about Eda losing her powers, so she sets sail in search of a lucrative bounty to help the Owl House.

episodes.name: Escaping Expulsion
episodes.overview: When Amity's parents get Luz, Willow and Gus expelled from Hexside, Luz strikes a dangerous deal with them to get back into school.

episodes.name: Echoes of the Past
episodes.overview: King's delusions of grandeur lead Luz, Lilith, and Hooty to a dangerous new island.

episodes.name: Keeping Up A-fear-ances
episodes.overview: Eda gets an unwelcome visit from a family member who puts a strain on everyone in the Owl House.

episodes.name: Through the Looking Glass Ruins
episodes.overview: Gus tries to impress a group of cool kids from Glandus High, while Luz and Amity journey into the most dangerous section of the library.

episodes.name: Hunting Palismen
episodes.overview: It’s Palisman Pairing Day at Hexside, but Luz doesn’t match with a Palisman of her own and soon finds herself on an unexpected journey with a foe.

episodes.name: Eda's Requiem
episodes.overview: A special witch from Eda’s past enlists her in a rebellion against the Emperor.

episodes.name: Knock, Knock, Knockin' on Hooty's Door
episodes.overview: Hooty tries to help King, Eda and Luz with their problems, but it doesn’t go as planned.

episodes.name: Eclipse Lake
episodes.overview: When Luz gets sick with the Common Mold, it's up to Amity to find an important ingredient for the portal door - but Amity's not the only one on its trail.

episodes.name: Yesterday's Lie
episodes.overview: Luz thinks she's found a way back home. But is she ready for what she'll find on the other side?

episodes.name: Follies at the Coven Day Parade
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of her trip home, Luz takes on daring rescue missions during the Coven Day parade.

episodes.name: Elsewhere and Elsewhen
episodes.overview: Luz is desperate for more information about Philip Wittebane, the creator of the portal door. With Lilith's help, she sets off on a journey for the ages.

episodes.name: Any Sport in a Storm
episodes.overview: Hunter goes uncover at Hexside for his most important mission yet. Willow becomes determined to succeed at an exciting new sport.

episodes.name: Reaching Out
episodes.overview: Amity wants to prove herself to her father, and Luz thinks she's found the perfect way to do it: Underground Witch Duels.

episodes.name: Them's the Breaks, Kid
episodes.overview: Eda tells a story from her teen years: the day she met Raine Whispers.

episodes.name: Hollow Mind
episodes.overview: A magical mishap transports Luz and Hunter into a new mindscape - and this one is a twisted nightmare.

episodes.name: Edge of the World
episodes.overview: King's quest to uncover his past leads to shocking revelations and horrifying truths.

episodes.name: Labyrinth Runners
episodes.overview: When the Emperor's coven comes to Hexside, Gus teams up with an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: O Titan, Where Art Thou
episodes.overview: Eda and Luz scramble to face the day of unity. King faces his true identity.

episodes.name: Clouds on the Horizon
episodes.overview: Everyone on the Isles prepares to celebrate the Day of Unity.

episodes.name: King's Tide
episodes.overview: The Day of Unity begins.

episodes.name: Thanks to Them
episodes.overview: After months of trying, Luz and her friends make a daring attempt to return to the Demon Realm.

episodes.name: For the Future
episodes.overview: Luz and her friends race against Belos to confront the Collector and save the Boiling Isles.

episodes.name: Watching and Dreaming
episodes.overview: The fate of the Boiling Isles rests on the shoulders of a human, a cursed witch and a little King.
